quest.desc: 뜨거운 햇살 아래서 공원을 순찰하다보면 금세 목이 마르다는 $npc:11000352$. 잠시라도 공원을 비우기 힘들다는 $npcName:11000352$$pp:를,을$ 위해, $map:02000209$에 들러 $item:30000245$$pp:를,을$ 구입하자. 참, 마트 직원에게 $npcName:11000352$의 심부름이라고 얘기하면 계산은 필요없다고 한다.

quest.name: 정산이 필요해
quest.desc: $npc:11000795$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000352$의 외상값이 너무 많아 정산을 하기 전에는 더 이상 외상을 주지 말라는 사장님의 지시를 받았다고 한다. 안타까워 하는 $npcName:11000795$$pp:를,을$ 뒤로 하고, 이 슬픈 소식을 $map:02000147$에 있는 $npcName:11000352$에게 전해 주자.

quest.name: 들끓는 파리떼
quest.desc: $map:02000138$ 과일 가게엔 손님 대신 파리떼만 들끓고 있다. 과일 주위를 날아다니는 파리떼 때문에 오던 손님도 돌아간다고 한다. 과일 장수 $npc:11000867$$pp:는,은$ 파리떼가 하수구 아래에 집을 짓고 사는게 틀림없다며 울상이다. $npc:11000867$$pp2:로,으로$부터 $item:30000246$$pp:를,을$ 건네 받아, 하수구 뚜껑 아래에 $item:30000246$$pp:를,을$ 뿌려 파리떼를 몰아내자.
quest.manual: $map:02000138$에 있는 $npc:11000867$로부터 $item:30000246$ 건네 받기|$map:02000138$의 하수구 뚜껑 아래에 $item:30000246$ 뿌리기

quest.name: 입막음
quest.desc: $npc:11000211$$pp:는,은$ 낯선 이로부터 정체를 알 수 없는 가방을 숨겨달라는 부탁을 받고는 흔쾌히 응했다고 한다. 거액의 메소를 사례로 지급하겠다는 말에 거절할 수 없었다고 한다. 하지만, 그의 부탁을 들어주고나니 왠지 모르게 꺼림칙한 모양이다. 더구나 몇몇 몬스터들은 $npc:11000211$$pp:가,이$ 가방 숨기는 광경을 목격하기도 했다고 한다. 소문이 나지 않게 몬스터들을 상대로 입막음을 해 달라는 $npc:11000211$! 내키지는 않지만 불안해 하는 $npc:11000211$$pp:를,을$ 위해 부탁을 들어주자.

quest.name: 안 좋은 예감은 틀리지 않는 법
quest.desc: 우려가 현실이 된 걸까. $npc:11000211$$pp:는,은$ 다짜고짜 가방의 행방을 묻는 흑성회를 상대로 거짓말을 하다 흠씬 두들겨 맞았다고 한다. $npc:11000867$$pp:가,이$ 타박상에 좋은 약을 가지고 있다고 하니, 온 몸이 쑤셔 거동이 불편한 $npc:11000211$$pp:를,을$ 위해 $npc:11000867$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 쇠똥도 약에 쓰려면 없는 법
quest.desc: $npc:11000867$$pp:는,은$ 약을 새로 만들어야 한다며 필요한 재료를 구해달라고 부탁한다. $npc:11000867$$pp:가,이$ 말한 재료는 다름 아닌 $npc:21000161$의 머리 장식! $map:02000138$에 있는 $npc:21000161$$pp2:로,으로$부터 $item:30000247$$pp:를,을$ 구해 $npc:11000867$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: 몸에 좋은 약은 입에 쓴 법
quest.desc: $npc:11000867$의 명약을 만들기 위해 필요한 또 하나의 재료는 바로, $item:30000248$! $npc:11000867$$pp:는,은$ 팔지 못 한 $item:30000248$$pp:를,을$ 쓰레기통에 버렸다며, 쓰레기통을 뒤지면 약을 만드는데 필요한 만큼의 $item:30000248$$pp:를,을$ 구할 수 있을 거라고 말한다. 내키지는 않지만 $map:02000138$에서 쓰레기통을 뒤져 $item:30000248$$pp:를,을$ 구한 뒤, $npc:11000867$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: 화재의 불씨를 없애자
quest.desc: $map:02000136$ 주변에 가스통이 널려 있음에도 여기저기 폭탄을 던져대는 $npc:21000282$. $npc:11000222$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21000282$ 때문에 자칫 큰 화재나 폭발이 발생하지는 않을까 불안해하고 있다. $npc:11000222$의 근심을 덜어주기 위해 $map:02000136$ 주변에 있는 $npc:21000282$$pp:를,을$ 쫓아내자.

quest.name: Celebratory Gathering
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$, $npcName:11001297$, and $npcName:11001294$ are celebrating having safely completed their missions as dragon knights. Let's join the gathering.

quest.name: By Neccessity, Not Chance
quest.desc: The Huntis Federation and the dragon knights, two groups destined to unite, completed the missions together. $npcName:11001297$ is happy to have met $npcName:11001292$ and $npcName:11001294$ through this event. I've heard that $npcName:11001292$ has a similar story of how he met $npcName:11001294$...

quest.name: Grand Opening
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$ recalled the grand opening of $map:02010053$ and $npcName:11001294$ described the circumstances of that day.
quest.manual: Speak with $npcName:11001493$ and go to the past|Speak with $npcName:11001499$ of the past

quest.name: The Customer Is Right
quest.desc: $npcName:11001294$ continued to explain that because he was the only customer, he was able to eat without stopping. However, after he appeared, $npcName:11001292$ couldn't handle cooking alone... $npcName:11001292$ finished the story for $npcName:11001294$ of that nightmarish day...
quest.manual: Speak with $npcName:11001498$ and go to the past|Observe the situation of that day

quest.name: Origins of Fate
quest.desc: From the mark on his wrist, $npcName:11001292$ recognized that $npcName:11001294$ was a dragon knight just like him. $npcName:11001297$ also brought up the first day she met $npcName:11001292$.

quest.name: Second Fate
quest.desc: $npcName:11001297$ suffered from an unknown source of pain until $npcName:11001292$ recognized that she was a dragon knight after hearing about her symptoms.

quest.name: 너희 또한 빛이 되리라
quest.desc: $item:30000515$에 적힌 다른 내용들이 궁금하다는 $npcName:11001292$. $map:52010022$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $item:30000515$$pp:를,을$ 구해 오자.

quest.name: 도와주실 분을 찾아요
quest.desc: 자신을 도와줄 누군가를 찾고 있는 $npcName:11000221$. $npcName:11000221$$pp:를,을$ 만나 무슨 도움이 필요한지 물어보자.

quest.name: 아무도 모르게
quest.desc: $map:03000135$의 허름한 책상 위에 놓아둔 비밀 지령서를 확인하라는 메시지가 전달됐다. 누가 보낸 것이며, 무슨 내용일까?

quest.name: 임무는 계속된다
quest.desc: $map:03000135$에서 $npcName:11000614$$pp:가,이$ 기다리고 있다고 한다. 무슨 임무가 기다리고 있을까…

quest.name: 웨이 홍의 속셈
quest.desc: 모두가 알현식이 취소된 걸 아쉬워하고 있을 때 미소 짓고 있는 한 사람, $npcName:11000251$$pp:다,이다$. $npcName:11001690$의 말에 따르면, $npcName:11000251$$pp:는,은$ 알현식 취소로 쓸모없어진 물품들을 빼돌리거나 싸게 매입하기 위해 왕실 담당자에게 줄을 댔다고 한다.

quest.name: 두 얼굴의 넬프
quest.desc: 무기고 도난 사건에 $npcName:11000492$$pp:가,이$ 연루된 사연을 알게 된 상황에서 더는 알현식 물품들을 빼돌리기가 어려워졌다. 계획이 틀어져 화가 나 있을 $npcName:11000251$$pp:를,을$ 달래려면 어떻게 해야 할까…

quest.name: 넬프의 행방
quest.desc: $npcName:11000492$$pp:가,이$ 벌인 무기고 도난 사건 때문에 알현식 물품을 빼돌리려던 흑성회의 계획이 물거품이 됐다. $npcName:11000492$$pp:를,을$ 잡아 $npcName:11000251$ 앞에 무릎 꿇리지 않으면 $npcName:11000251$의 분노가 어디로 향할지 모른다. 서둘러 $npcName:11000492$의 행방을 쫓자.

quest.name: 블랙 하우스
quest.desc: $map:52000034$의 공사가 진행되는 동안 무척이나 시끄러워 경비 서기 힘들었다는 $npcName:11001677$. 어떤 이유인지는 모르겠지만, 공사가 중단돼 다행이라고 말한다. $npcName:11001677$$pp:가,이$ 알려준 곳으로 가보자.

quest.name: 넬프가 남긴 것
quest.desc: 구겨진 메모에 표시된 $map:02000043$의 $map:52000037$까지 찾아왔지만… 안타깝게도 $npc:11000492$는 죽어 있었다. $npc:11000492$$pp:는,은$ 왜 이런 곳에서 죽어있는 것일까? 그에게는 도대체 무슨 일이 있었던 것일까? 그가 저지른 비리와 그의 죽음과 관련한 풀리지 않는 의문들을 풀어줄 수 있는 단서가 이 주변에 있지 않을까? 정신을 가다듬고 $npc:11000492$의 주변을 자세히 살펴보자.

quest.name: 새로운 단서
quest.desc: $npc:11000492$의 죽음과 그 주변에서 발견된 의문의 수첩에 대한 이야기를 들고 난 후, $npc:11000169$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000119$에게 직접 지금까지 조사한 내용을 보고해달라고 했다. $map:02000001$에서 $npcName:11000119$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 자베스의 호출
quest.desc: $map:52000034$에서 잿빛의 이리를 기다리던 $npc:11001682$. 무슨 말이 하고 싶어 안달 났던 걸까.

quest.name: 눈의 가시
quest.desc: $item:20000046$$pp:며,이며$ $item:20000015$$pp:를,을$ 흑성회가 유통하고 있다는 사실은 $map:02000100$에선 비밀이 아니다. 더구나 아무도 이를 문제 삼고 있지 않다고 한다. 오로지 다크윈드만이 못마땅히 여기고 시비라는데…

quest.name: 흑성회의 비밀 멤버
quest.desc: 보스의 지시를 잿빛의 이리에게 전하는 $npcName:11001674$. 다크윈드를 드나들며 이상 분위기를 감지하게 되면 즉시 흑성회에 알리라고 말한다.

quest.name: 사찰 대상
quest.desc: 잿빛의 이리에게 수첩을 건네는 $npcName:11000251$. 다크윈드 대원이 지니고 있던 수첩인 듯 하다. 어떤 내용이 담겨 있을까?

quest.name: 다크윈드 지령
quest.desc: 다크윈드 대장 $npcName:11000044$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000100$ $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: 의례적인 호출
quest.desc: 잊을만 하면 $map:52000034$$pp2:로,으로$ 잿빛의 이리를 호출하는 $npc:11001682$. 딱히 할 말이 있어 부른 것 같지는 않은데…

quest.name: 제이시의 호출
quest.desc: $map:02000216$$pp:를,을$ 방문한 잿빛의 이리를 반기는 $npcName:11000515$. 무슨 말을 하고 싶어 부른 걸까?

quest.name: 그녀가 하고 싶은 말
quest.desc: 알현식 물품 도난 사건의 범인으로 험플스가 지목됐다는 사실에 의구심을 표하는 $npcName:11000515$.

quest.name: 고독한 비밀
quest.desc: 다크윈드 대장 $npcName:11000044$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000100$ $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: 새로운 지시
quest.desc: 비욘드 링크에서 관리하는 건물이 어둠의 땅에서 발견됐다고 한다. $npcName:11001678$, $npcName:11001686$ 무리에 합류해 건물을 조사하자.

quest.name: 수상한 창고
quest.desc: 버려진 것 같은 창고에 경비 시스템이 잘 갖춰진 게 수상하다는 $npcName:11001678$. 이곳에서 어떤 정보를 얻을 수 있을까? 그리고, $npcName:11000251$$pp:가,이$ 얻고자 하는 정보는 무엇일까?

quest.name: 의미 모를 단서
quest.desc: 창고의 경비 로봇 부품을 살펴 보던 $npcName:11001678$$pp:는,은$ 부품에 적혀 있는 문구 중에 낯익은 지명을 발견한다. 그곳에 가면 원하는 걸 얻을 수 있을까?

quest.name: 내가 없는 곳에선
quest.desc: 흑성회에서 $map:52000039$$pp:를,을$ 조사하라는 지시가 내려왔다고 한다. $npcName:11001679$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001687$$pp:는,은$ 먼저 출발했다고 하니, 서둘러 $map:52000039$에 가보자.

quest.name: 위기의 순간, 빛나는 동료애
quest.desc: $npcName:11001679$$pp:가,이$ 위험에 처했다고 한다. $npcName:11001687$$pp:는,은$ 다급한 목소리로 $npcName:11001679$$pp:를,을$ 구하러 가자는데…

quest.name: 본격적인 조사
quest.desc: $map:52000039$의 위험 요소는 모두 제거한 듯 하다. 본격적으로 내부를 조사해 보자.

quest.name: 나설 수 없는 일
quest.desc: $npcName:11000251$$pp:가,이$ 찾고 있다며, $map:02000156$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보라는 $npcName:11000515$.

quest.name: 앞길을 가로막는 자
quest.desc: 뒷골목 사람들이 끌려갔다는 그곳, $map:63000038$에 도착했다. 그들의 생사가 걱정되니, 서둘러 구하러 가자.

quest.name: 뒷골목 사람들을 찾아서
quest.desc: $npcName:11001782$에 따르면, 뒷골목 사람들은 $map:63000039$에 갇혀 있다고 한다. 어서 가서 그들을 풀어주자.

quest.name: 나를 위한 희생
quest.desc: 더 이상 가이던스를 위험에 빠뜨리지 않기 위해, 그리고 내가 누구인지 알기 위해 더 이상 비욘드 링크와 칸두라를 외면할 수는 없을 것 같다. 망설이지 말고, $map:63000038$에 들어가 보자.

quest.name: 또 다른 희생
quest.desc: 나를 대신해 부상을 입은 $npcName:11001789$$pp:를,을$ 뒤로 하고 $npcName:11001780$$pp:를,을$ 상대하자.

quest.name: 새로운 가족
quest.desc: 보여주고 싶은 것이 있다는 $npcName:11001791$. 그를 따라 $map:63000040$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동하자.

quest.name: Popularity
quest.desc: $npcName:11000076$ needs your attention urgently. What a burden it is to be so popular!

quest.name: Settling the Ranks
quest.desc: Though $npcName:11000044$ has left Dark Wind, his agents remain in Dark Wind and the army. You must track down his allies and remove them from the ranks. Meet with $npc:11000119$ and come up with a plan.

quest.name: Scene of the Crime
quest.desc: It's time to root out $npcName:11000044$'s spies. Search $map:52000073$ for clues.

quest.name: A Careful Search
quest.desc: Search the $map:52000073$ carefully to see if $npcName:11000044$ left any evidence behind. Start with the desk.

quest.name: A Hidden Place
quest.desc: Everything is not always what it seems. As $npcName:11000044$ had a hidden side, the $map:52000073$ may also be hiding something.

quest.name: Accomplice
quest.desc: Someone is covering $npcName:11000044$'s tracks. Ask $npcName:11000215$ if there have been any other visitors to the office.

quest.name: Cold Sweat
quest.desc: $npcName:11000215$ denies being a follower of $npcName:11000044$. You'll have to keep looking for suspects...

quest.name: The List
quest.desc: The charred documents that you found contain a list of people who have crossed $npcName:11000044$ and their location. Much of it is illegible, but you can just make out the words "$map:52000075$."

quest.name: Criminal Protection
quest.desc: $npcName:11000526$ may be a criminal, but he still deserves a fair trial. Make sure that he's safe and secure in the $map:02000134$.

quest.name: The Next Target
quest.desc: You weren't able to save $npcName:11000526$, but $npcName:11000064$ is also on $npcName:11000044$'s list. Make sure that he's safe.

quest.name: Increased Guard
quest.desc: You've let the guard know that $npcName:11000064$ may be in danger. That should be enough... right?

quest.name: A Difficult Rumor
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000266$ has something to say.

quest.name: Reassuring the Ranks
quest.desc: To help bolster morale, $npcName:11000076$ suggests making $npcName:11000064$ the leader of Dark Wind. However, $npcName:11000266$ isn't sure if the other members would agree with this idea...

quest.name: The Leader of Dark Wind
quest.desc: I must first find out if $npcName:11000064$ is even interested in becoming the leader of Dark Wind.

quest.name: A Worthy Proposition
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ suggests that you ask $npcName:11000006$ to be the new leader of Dark Wind, instead.

quest.name: The Bait
quest.desc: Humblis has been investigating $npcName:11000044$'s activities on their own, and they think they've found the members of Dark Wind who are loyal to him. They have a plan...

quest.name: Misdirection
quest.desc: Set the trap by feeding false information to $npcName:11000215$, who happens to be a terrible gossip.

quest.name: Cleaning House
quest.desc: It's time to spring the trap on $npcName:11000044$'s spies. Defeat $npcNamePlural:29000146$ in the $map:52000070$.

quest.name: Elated Victory
quest.desc:
Now that $npcName:11000044$'s spies have been captured, the members of Humblis are going to rejoin Dark Wind.
Deliver this news to the guard.

quest.name: Too Soon to Celebrate
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ is curious about the news of $npcName:11000006$ and $npcName:11000044$'s spies. Bring him up to date.

quest.name: Strange Disappearance
quest.desc: There's urgency in $npc:11000076$'s voice. What does he have to say?

quest.name: Taken Away
quest.desc: $npcName:11000076$ believes that $npcName:11000523$ was kidnapped. It seems like a trap for $npcName:11000064$—one that he willingly jumped into. Make sure he isn't jumping into the trap alone.
quest.manual: Enter the $map:52000072$ at the $map:02000146$ and find $npcName:11001915$

quest.name: Her Reasons
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000523$ left with $npcName:11000044$ of her own free will. $npcName:11000064$ is sure she must have had a reason, but the guard would never understand. Why don't you just tell them that she's gone on a... a trip?

quest.name: Getting Lennon
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ has yet to return. $npcName:11000266$ wants to discuss the matter of Dark Wind's new leader with him. Go find him.

quest.name: Losing Lennon
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ is nowhere to be found. Wouldn't $npcName:11000006$ know where he went?

quest.name: Low Profile
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ has an idea about how to find $npcName:11000064$ more quickly.

quest.name: A Kind of Lead
quest.desc: Since $npcName:11000006$ can't afford to make any waves in the search for $npcName:11000064$, he wants you to reach out to one of his less conventional sources. Meet the informant at the $map:03000103$.

quest.name: Searching Sight
quest.desc: $npcName:11001238$ will show you the way to $npcName:11000064$. Of course, she needs you to fetch ingredients for her first.
quest.manual: Get $item:30000614$ from $npcName:40000145$ in $map:03000060$ |Get $item:30000615$ from $npcName:40000128$ in $map:03000024$ |Get $item:30000616$ from $npcName:40000126$ in $map:03000101$

quest.name: An Unseen Threat
quest.desc:
It seems that $npcName:11000064$ is in trouble. Perhaps $npcName:11001238$ will send you to his side.
If you don't want to speak to $npcName:11001238$, you can take the temporary portal to the $map:52000076$, instead.
quest.complete: Go to $map:52000068$ from $map:02000349$ and speak with $npcName:11001917$

quest.name: Guard Captain's Lament
quest.desc: $npcName:11000119$ thanks you for saving $map:02000001$. He looks like he's aged ten years...

quest.name: Rob from the Rich
quest.desc: Empty out the safe before the coppers arrive.
quest.manual: Move $item:30000776$ from the safe to the exit

quest.name: Give to the Poor
quest.desc: Share the money you took from $map:52000128$ with the poor of $map:52000129$.
quest.manual: Give money to $npcName:11003277$ |Give money to $npcName:11003278$ |Give money to $npcName:11003279$

quest.name: Holy Mission
quest.desc: The soldiers who went out with $npcName:11003328$ all returned from the mission with grave injuries. Fulfill your duties as a Priest and heal them.

quest.name: Picking Up
quest.desc: Clean up the trash in $map:52000145$ for $npcName:11003189$.

quest.name: Quiver Basket Cleanup
quest.desc: While $npcName:11003189$ gets some "well deserved" sleep, move the quiver baskets into position for today's practice.

quest.name: The Fallen Squire
quest.desc: Carry $npcName:11003398$'s unconscious body to $npcName:11003400$.

quest.name: A Friend in Need
quest.desc: If you don't hurry, $npcName:11003399$ will die of terminal nausea! Get help from the priest, $npcName:11003402$.

quest.name: Homebound
quest.desc: Jonathan Button reached out to say that he'd found something interesting he wants you to see. It's been a while since you've been back home, why not go see what he has to say? Meet with Jonathan in $map:52000156$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Reunion
quest.desc: Jonathan called you into the $map:52000155$—a former Dark Wind hideout. Thankfully, they've abandoned the place. Apparently he's been living there with some associates. Well, might as well go inside and see what he wants to show you.

quest.name: Fresh-Squeezed Joy
quest.desc: $npcName:11003272$... $npcName:11003273$... You thought they were dead. But here they are waiting for you at the Jazz Club. They said $npcName:11001927$ tried to kill them, too, but failed to finish the job. All that matters now is you've been reunited with your old crew!

quest.name: An Important Discussion
quest.desc: With $npcName:11003272$ and $npcName:11003273$ in a sugar coma after your juice party, Jonathan becomes very serious. He wants to talk to you about something. Meet him in the basement.

quest.name: An Old Grudge
quest.desc: You followed Jonathan to the basement, where he shows you a photograph that opens some old wounds, and causes you to adjust your priorities. See what else Jonathan has to say.

quest.name: The Call of Vengeance
quest.desc: Jonathan showed you a picture of $npcName:11001927$, the man who betrayed you and attempted to kill you and your friends. It seems he's been illegally dealing in lapenshards. With this information in hand, you begin to form a plan to take your revenge.

quest.name: The Appointed Time
quest.desc: Your training is complete and the power of the lapenshard is yours. The question remains: are you ready to take down $npcName:11001927$? Talk to Jonathan and see what he thinks.

quest.name: Nothing Comes Free
quest.desc: With your newfound power, Jonathan believes you just might be up to the challenge of defeating $npcName:11001927$. But if you're going to have your revenge, you'll need to actually find the guy. Lucky for you, Jonathan has a plan! Listen to what he has to say.

quest.name: The Debt Comes Due
quest.desc: Jonathan says that his help was not free, but rather comes at a steep cost... Though you are initially filled with dread, it turns out his terms are actually quite reasonable. In a way, they've already been paid. Speak with Jonathan.

quest.name: Such Sweet Sorrow
quest.desc: The cost of Jonathan's help was to be his friend? Little did he realize, you were friends from the start. Now, a new mission awaits you at the Frontier Foundation. It's time to say goodbye to your friends once again—the old, and the "new."

quest.name: Recovering Lost Memories
quest.desc: In pursuit of your lost memories, you close your eyes and think of $map:52000156$. There in your mindscape, you recall a conversation you had with $npcName:11000006$.

quest.name: Memories of the Past
quest.desc: The lapenshard $npcName:11000006$ gave you was being studied by Dark Wind. Owing to its connection to the red lapenta which controls time, he's optimistic the crystal can help you recover your lost memories.

quest.name: Mystery Man
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ gave you something called a lapenshard and a report on what Dark Wind had learned about them. His hope was that you might be able to use it to recover your lost memories, and it seems to be working! You find yourself whirled away to a different place in the midst of calamity.

quest.name: Distorted Memories
quest.desc: You found yourself in a burning, but when you approached the flames you couldn't feel their heat. It was a memory, and in it you witnessed $npcName:11003185$ speaking with a $npcName:11004044$. You were not prepared for what came next.

quest.name: The Forgotten Truth
quest.desc: After witnessing the $npcName:11004044$'s death at the hands of $npcName:11003185$, your head begins to reel. That child next to the $npcName:11003915$... Is that you? A murderous rage overtakes you.

quest.name: An Origin Remembered
quest.desc: As the $npcName:11003915$ breathed his last, a murderous rage washed over you. $npcName:11003185$ said something about seeing if you have what it takes. What did he mean by that? You awaken from your memory to a startling realization.

quest.name: Muscle Memory
quest.desc: Awakening from your memory, you come to the startling realization that your whole life has been spent in service of the man who murdered your father—the monster known as $npcName:11003185$. There was more to the memory, though. Something that may help you quell your burning desire for vengeance.

quest.name: A Lethal Technique
quest.desc: After reliving one of your lost memories, a thought strikes you. The technique $npcName:11003185$ used is one that he never taught you. $npcName:11003185$ may have taught you everything you know, but apparently not everything he knows. If you can master this skill, perhaps you can use it when you give $npcName:11003185$ his just desserts.

quest.name: Exacting Vengeance
quest.desc: The skill $npcName:11003185$ used in your memory seems to have been intentionally hidden from you. Perhaps he feared you would use it against him. Now that you've memorized it, it's time to resume your journey.

quest.name: Cruelty and Justice
quest.desc: Now that you have mastered $npcName:11003185$'s secret technique, it's time to figure out where to go from here. Since he provided you with the lapenshard in the first place, you decide to speak with $npcName:11000006$ and bring him up to speed on what happened.

quest.name: As the Crow Flies
quest.desc: After emerging from your memory and mastering a new technique, you returned to $npcName:11000006$. It seems that $npcName:11000006$ was also familiar with the technique, but resolved never to use it because it was too cruel. He also filled you in on the latest intel regarding $npcName:11003185$.

quest.name: Renewed Pursuit
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ says that Dark Wind has received word of $npcName:11003185$'s recent movements. As much as you want to track down $npcName:11003185$ and end his life, you can't do that without finding him first. Talk to $npcName:11000006$.

quest.name: Introspection
quest.desc: On a visit to Lith Harbor, you stumbled over some crystals sitting on the ground and just about blew your top. Maybe if you take a moment to reflect on your thoughts, you can calm down a little.

quest.name: A Familiar Face
quest.desc: After a conversation with your $npcName:11003918$ that sounded suspiciously like $npcName:11003920$, who should you encounter but your adoptive sister herself! But what is she doing here? Speak with $npcName:11003920$.

quest.name: A Not-So-Stupid Stone
quest.desc: Wait a second! How did $npcName:11003920$ know you were in Lith?! Is she stalking you? $npcName:11003920$ said she paid some information broker to find you... Was she that worried about you? Maybe it's time you told $npcName:11003920$ about what's going on with you.

quest.name: Awakened Rage
quest.desc: $npcName:11003920$ seemed unsurprised to hear what you had to say. In fact, she seems to know more about that dumb rock than you do! Even though sisters are annoying and should be ignored as a general rule, maybe you should listen to what $npcName:11003920$ has to say.

quest.name: Anger Management
quest.desc: $npcName:11003920$ says that stone you've been kicking around is something called a lapenshard. Apparently they've been making people stronger and giving them new abilities. Wow! It's a good thing it hasn't exploded or anything. Anyway, she says maybe that lapenwhatever's started to wake up the god of rage's power which has been slumbering within you. Welp, now what? Speak with your smarty-pants sister.

quest.name: Whack-An-Island
quest.desc: While you were away from $map:52000161$, $npcName:11003920$ thumbed through your old man's books on the god of rage. She has this crazy theory that if you can master the abilities the god of rage used, maybe you can control your rage too. That would be awesome! And at the very least, it's an excuse to break things. So you hopped on a boat with $npcName:11003920$, and off you go!

quest.name: Mastery of Rage
quest.desc: Hoping to learn to control your anger and unlock the power of the god of rage without unleashing untold destruction, $npcName:11003920$ develops a training regimen for you. After destroying the many—thankfully unoccupied—outlying islands around Rien, your training is complete. Now what? Talk to $npcName:11003920$.

quest.name: An Upscale Affair
quest.desc: With your training complete and your rage under slightly better control, it's time to figure out what comes next. Thankfully, $npcName:11003920$ has a plan!

quest.name: The Real Agenda
quest.desc: Though your training is over, your work has just begun. Apparently all this was to help get your anger under control so you can go somewhere fancy. When all's said and done, maybe you'll find the old man. Talk to $npcName:11003920$ to learn more.

quest.name: We'll Meet Again
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003920$ told you about the "Frontier Foundation," an organization responsible for regulating the lapenshards. She says you have a responsibility to use your power to help the world, but it sure seems like her main goal is tracking down the old man. Still, that's fine by you. You'll go to the Frontier Foundation, learn about the lapenshards, and get any help they can offer toward finding the geezer.
Before you go, you should probably say goodbye to $npcName:11003920$.

quest.name: A Barbecue Among Friends
quest.desc:
After a long journey, a letter from an old friend brings you back to Ellinel. What could be better than a barbecue with your best bud Kate?!
You and $npcName:11003925$ should catch up!

quest.name: Stoking the Flames of Friendship
quest.desc: You're having a lovely visit with your old friend $npcName:11003925$, but for some reason your dinner isn't roasting properly! $npcName:11003925$ seems really worked up about something. She must be hungry.

quest.name: One-Track Mind
quest.desc: $npcName:11003925$ has been talking to herself for quite some time... Something about Professor Einos? Why isn't this stupid meat cooking faster?!

quest.name: Crunchy Crystal Candy
quest.desc: Kate's been nagging you about something again, but it was hard to pay attention with your stomach grumbling like that. But what's that shiny thing over there, a bit of tasty rock candy?!

quest.name: Power Overwhelming
quest.desc: You found a tasty-looking piece of rock candy on the ground, and your hunger got the better of you. Forget the five second rule, a wizard's gotta eat!

quest.name: Mana Overload
quest.desc: You feel a little funny after munching on your ground-candy. Perhaps something to do with that explosion? $npcName:11003925$ seems worried, but what ever for? Sure eating off the floor was kinda gross, but you were starving!

quest.name: A Wizard Reborn
quest.desc: So eating the floor-candy might not have been a such a good idea... It was a GREAT one. Sure it was weird that the mana overflowing from your body created an explosion that rocked the whole forest, but you feel AMAZING! Still, Kate seems really worried. You should talk to her.

quest.name: What Do You Mean it Wasn't Candy?
quest.desc: Contrary to you, who feels totally awesome, $npcName:11003925$ is worried. She took you back to Ellinel for a checkup, but you don't know what the big deal is. See what she has to say.

quest.name: Word of Mouth
quest.desc: According to Kate, what you thought was carelessly misplaced rock candy was actually a powerful magical object called a lapenshard. Apparently they make people stronger? Given your strange new situation, Kate proposes an idea.

quest.name: What's a Wizard to Do?
quest.desc:
Now that you're a lapenshard-enhanced wizard, $npcName:11003925$ suggests you join the Frontier Foundation to learn more about the lapenshards. Apparently the Frontier Foundation is an organization responsible for researching the lapenshards.
It could be worth considering. See what else Kate has to say!

quest.name: Professor Kate
quest.desc:
Inspired by your battles against the forces of darkness, $npcName:11003925$ wonders aloud if she has a bigger part to play. After all, with the power of the lapenshards, any wizard could become strong enough to join the fight!
Wait... Kate's still talking?

quest.name: If You Say So
quest.desc: Kate says you should join the Frontier Foundation, and who are you to disagree? She's a pretty smart girl. That means it's time to say bye bye $npcName:11003925$ for now!

quest.name: A Much-Needed Break
quest.desc: After a long and difficult journey, you decide to pay a visit to your old home on Halo Mountain in the hopes of encountering your friends. Much to your delight, there you encountered $npcName:11003952$ and $npcName:11001709$. It's about time you three caught up.

quest.name: Drifting Off
quest.desc: After you told them of your adventures since parting, your friends suggested that you get some well-deserved rest. That was when $npcName:11001709$ let something slip about events going in Maple World. $npcName:11003952$ said that was a discussion best left for later. Just what is going on?

quest.name: A Power Sealed Within
quest.desc: You were about to ask $npcName:11003952$ what was going on when your head got a little foggy. Next thing you knew, you found yourself somewhere else and were met by a familiar face.

quest.name: The Will to Power
quest.desc:
It seems you were called into this inner space by $npcName:11003951$. There you learned that gems called "lapenshards" had appeared throughout Maple World.
Somehow related to the lapentas, these shards had awakened the power of the Munakra sealed within you. As this power grows, it threatens to break the shackles that bind it—the force of which could end your life.
If you are to survive, you must free this power immediately. For that however, you need determination, and clarity of purpose. Speak with $npcName:11003951$ to learn more.

quest.name: Clarity of Purpose
quest.desc: I can't tell you whether you're worthy of the power of the Munakra or not but... Your intentions are true. Well then, let's begin.

quest.name: The Power of the Munakra
quest.desc:
With $npcName:11001560$'s aid, you succeeded in freeing the power of the Munakra sealed within you, saving your own life and unleashing new power.
You awakened to find $npcName:11001558$ and $npcName:11003949$ worrying over you. Speak with $npcName:11003949$.

quest.name: Unshackled and Empowered
quest.desc:
When you came to your senses, you were lying in Guidance's lodgings on Halo Mountain. It seems you were out for some time. And according to your friends, the chi flowing through your body moves more powerfully than ever.
Out of the corner of your eye you spot a familiar face... one you never expected to see here.

quest.name: A Time for All Things
quest.desc: Who's that over there? ...$npcName:11001560$?! Apparently as a bonus from unleashing the power of the Munakra, $npcName:11001560$ can come into the real world to chat. See what else $npcName:11001560$ has to say!

quest.name: Inside Information
quest.desc: You're a little worried about what it means to have $npcName:11001560$ walking about the real world unseen, but $npcName:11001560$ says not to worry about that right now. Your friends are probably worried about you. Why not talk with $npcName:11003952$?

quest.name: Walk Your Own Path
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003952$ said he and Tinchai were getting ready to go help the "Frontier Foundation" with their investigation into the lapenshards. $npcName:11001558$ was taken aback by your knowledge of the lapenshards, but answered your questions about the Foundation anyway.
With that matter settled, it seems that $npcName:11003952$ has an unusual request for you.

quest.name: The Constant Companion
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001558$ and $npcName:11003949$ have set off for the Frontier Foundation. Before you follow suit, you have unfinished business with $npcName:11003951$.
Speak with $npcName:11003951$.

quest.name: The Strange Swordsman
quest.desc: Upon arriving at the Frontier Foundation, you discovered a group of powerful-looking adventurers. As you take in the scenery, a long-haired swordsman strikes up a conversation with you. Speak with the $npcName:11003963$.

quest.name: A Different Manner of Bladecraft
quest.desc: Upon arriving at the Frontier Foundation, you discovered a group of powerful-looking adventurers. Say, is that person over there a swordsman like you? What's up with her shield? Go speak with the $npcName:11003955$.

quest.name: Little Miss Fancypants
quest.desc: You arrive at the Frontier Foundation and discover a group of tough-looking adventurers. They'd probably make a decent challenge. You asked if anyone wanted to spar, but some self-important little jerk started cramping on your style. Does this $npcName:11003956$ think she's better than you?

quest.name: Accosted By a Brute
quest.desc: You finally arrived at the Frontier Foundation, a place of true splendor. As you admire your surroundings, you can't help but be distracted by a loud and uncivilized individual shouting in your ear. What is such a person doing in a place like this?

quest.name: A Matter of Methods
quest.desc: As you arrived at the Frontier Foundation, finding $npcName:11003932$ was still the first thing on your mind. Where did he go? Perhaps someone here can help you track him down?

quest.name: Magical Superiority
quest.desc:
Wow the Frontier Foundation has so much free food, and it's all delicious! You decided to take a break from eating to explore the premise when you bumped into a real jerkwad.
All you wanted to do was help out a stranger and the guy decided to bite your head off.

quest.name: Technical Superiority
quest.desc: You arrived at the Frontier Foundation and bumped into a hapless fellow with a dilemma only you could solve! You suggested the perfect solution, but naturally, an air-headed wizard couldn't help butting in.

quest.name: The Wolf's New Fan
quest.desc: So you've arrived at the Frontier Foundation. There are a few people here who look really tough. Maybe they'd be up for a fight? But first maybe you should introduce yourself and let them know that you are in fact the famous Gray Wolf. It's only polite.

quest.name: An Unusual Introduction
quest.desc: You finally arrived at the Frontier Foundation and marveled at its decadence. It's filled with strong-looking adventurers. But who is that strange man, and why is he approaching you?

quest.name: Opportunity and Motive
quest.desc: You arrived at the Frontier Foundation and found it packed to the gills with priceless junk. You could easily sneak off with a small fortune's worth of goodies, if it weren't for that nosy lady staring at you.

quest.name: A Crime of Opportunity
quest.desc: You arrived at the Frontier Foundation only to discover a loud and obnoxious individual clearly casing the establishment. You can't help but feel angry about his blatant intent. You should keep an eye on him.

quest.name: First Order of Business
quest.desc: You've arrived in the new land, and already $npcName:11004341$ needs to see you. Check in with her and make sure everything is okay.

quest.name: A Thorough Investigation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004341$ has detected a source of lapenta energy on Kritias. How could it have come to be here? Speak with her to learn more.

quest.name: Epiphany
quest.desc: Sky Fortress doesn't have the manpower to investigate $npcName:11004341$'s unexpected readings. Go to the coordinates she provided and see if you can find the source of this lapenta energy.

quest.name: Unknown yet Familiar
quest.desc: There was a cave at the coordinates $npcName:11004341$ gave you. This place is stunning! Examine the strange light.

quest.name: Instinct for Power
quest.desc: The energy in the cave is strangely familiar. Examine the $npcName:11004339$.

quest.name: An Inner Change
quest.desc: The light of the lapenta energy is captivating. Without thinking, you reached out to touch it, and then...

quest.name: A Powerful Resonance
quest.desc: A change occurred within you after coming into contact with the lapenta energy. For now, go back to $npcName:11004341$ and give her your report.

quest.name: Your New Self
quest.desc: You're resonating with lapenta energy. With this new power, you feel ready to take on anything Kritias throws at you!

quest.name: 간절한 마음
quest.desc: $npc:11001392$$pp:를,을$ 도우려고 했지만 실패했던 $npc:11001396$$pp:는,은$ 비약을 만들어 주었던 $npc:11001397$에게 따지러 갔다가 오히려 어린이에게 급하게 약을 썼다며 질책을 들었다고 한다. 성급했던 자신의 행동을 반성하며, 새로 만든 약은 괜찮을지 먼저 확인을 하고 싶다는 $npcName:11001396$. 그녀가 부탁한 대로 $map:02010063$의 $npc:11001443$$pp:를,을$ 만나 보자.

quest.name: 의사의 진단
quest.desc: $npc:11001443$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000520$$pp:를,을$ 꼼꼼히 살펴보고 어린이에게 써도 괜찮을 것 같다는 처방을 내린다. 다만 $npc:11001392$$pp:와,과$ 그 오빠 $npcName:11001391$$pp:가,이$ 체력이 떨어져 있고, 약에 대해 거부감도 클 테니 음식에 섞어 먹도록 하는 것이 좋을 것 같다. $map:02010063$에서 가장 요리를 잘 한다는 인심 좋은 $npc:11001388$$pp:를,을$ 만나 보자.

quest.name: 가족의 마음으로
quest.desc: 사연을 들은 $npc:11001388$$pp:는,은$ 남매를 위해 기꺼이 음식을 준비한다. 몸도, 마음도 아픈 남매의 가족이 되어 주고 싶다는 마음으로 $npcName:11001388$$pp:가,이$ 정성껏 준비한 $item:30000521$$pp:를,을$ $npcName:11001392$의 오빠인 $npcName:11001391$에게 전하자.

quest.name: 보답받은 믿음
quest.desc: $npc:11001392$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000521$$pp:를,을$ 먹고 상태가 한결 나아졌다며, 자신과의 약속을 지켜 준 $npcName:11001396$에게 고맙다는 말을 전해 달라고 한다. 강하고 똑똑해 보이지만 마음이 약하다는 $npc:11001396$에게 $npcName:11001392$의 상태와 그녀의 인사를 전해주자.

quest.name: 특별한 부름
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000075$$pp:가,이$ 찾고 있다며 $map:02000025$ 위층의 $map:52000033$$pp2:로,으로$ 찾아오라고 한다.
quest.complete: $map:02000001$ 북쪽, 왕궁 입구 위층에 있는 $map:52000033$에서 $npc:11000075$$pp:와,과$ 대화하기

quest.name: 새로운 힘을 얻다
quest.desc: $map:52000033$에서 만난 $npc:11000075$$pp:는,은$ 최근 빅토리아 아일랜드 서쪽에서 감지된 수상한 땅울림에 대해 말해 주며 어둠의 힘이 보다 가깝게 다가왔음을 알린다. $npc:11000075$$pp:는,은$ 보다 큰 어둠에 대응하기 위한 새로운 힘을 주겠다며, "특성" 을 쓸 수 있도록 해준다.

quest.name: 모험을 위한 준비
quest.desc: 새로운 힘, "특성"을 개방한 만큼 보다 다양한 형태로 성장할 수 있을 거라고 말해주는 $npc:11000119$. 자신을 단련하기 위해 다양한 일들을 해 보라고 조언하며, "메이플 길라잡이" 를 확인하면 지금의 레벨에 해볼만한 일들을 확인할 수 있을 거라고 알려준다. 특히 스킬을 업그레이드하면 보다 강한 힘을 사용할 수 있을 것이라며, $item:40100022$$pp:를,을$ 선물로 주었다.

quest.name: 신비한 힘을 모아라
quest.desc: $npc:11000601$$pp:는,은$ 신비한 힘을 모으는 이들을 통해 보다 강해질 수 있는 방법을 알고 싶다면 자신을 찾아오라며, $map:02000025$에서 기다리겠다고 한다.

quest.name: 별조각을 모으는 사람들
quest.desc: 신비한 힘을 가진 희귀한 별조각을 모으는 이들. 그들은 스스로를 별지기라 부르며, $item:30000447$$pp:나,이나$ $item:30000448$$pp:를,을$ 가져오면 모험에 도움이 되는 각종 물품들로 바꿔주고 있다고 하는데… $item:30000447$$pp:를,을$ 얻는 방법에 대해 $map:02010063$의 $npcFunction:11001271$ $npc:11001271$에게 직접 들어 보자.

quest.name: Mission from the Empress
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ needs to see you. Meet her in $map:02000025$.

quest.name: The Royal Lowdown
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ has received disturbing reports from the Land of Darkness. Followers of the ancient Demon King have appeared. She wants you to venture into the Land of Darkness and discover the origin of these monsters.

quest.name: A Potent Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11000601$ has decided to tell you about gemstones, a kind of material that holds extraordinary power. Meet her in $map:02000025$ to learn how you can make their power your own.

quest.name: 근위대장의 부름
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:가,이$ 전할 말이 있다며 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000001$에서 그를 만나보자.

quest.name: 짙은 그림자의 습격
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000118$의 끊어진 땅에 수상한 어둠의 문이 올라왔다고 말해준다. 그 문 너머는 어느 곳으로 통할지 모르는 비틀린 어둠의 공간으로, 조사하러 들어갔다가 운좋게 살아돌아온 근위대원들의 증언에 따르면 그 안은 마치 다른 세상 같은 칠흑의 어둠이 가득했고 괴력을 소유한 몬스터들이 있었다고 한다. 이에 왕실 근위대에서는 능력 있는 모험가들에게 '그림자 원정대'라는 이름 아래 그곳을 탐험하고 내부를 파악해 줄 것을 요청하기로 했다고 한다.

quest.name: 그림자 속으로
quest.desc: $map:02000118$의 끊어진 땅에 파견된 $npc:11001700$$pp:는,은$ 깊은 어둠 속에서 살아남으려면 그 안에서만 통용되는 규칙과 원정대 전용 특성을 잘 이해하고 활용하는 것이 중요하다고 말한다. 실제 도전을 눈앞에 두었으니, 이제 최선을 다해 그곳을 탐사해 달라며 응원의 말을 전한다.

quest.name: 다시 모인 제자들
quest.desc: $npc:11001677$$pp:는,은$ 사형들이 오른쪽으로 난 길을 따라가면 있는 귀여운 나무집으로 들어갔다고 한다. $npcName:11001715$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001707$$pp:를,을$ 만나기 위해 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 탐문 시작
quest.desc: 우선 $map:02000001$에서 신기에 대한 정보를 탐색해 보자고 말하는 $npc:11001707$. $npc:11001716$의 간호를 위해 움직일 수 없는 그녀 대신 정보를 탐색해 보자. 마침 $npc:11001707$$pp:가,이$ 왕궁 앞에서 안내원을 본 적이 있다고 하니, 일단 $npc:11000160$에게 가서 정보를 얻어보자.

quest.name: 정신없는 안내원
quest.desc: $npc:11000160$$pp:는,은$ 유물이라면 거의 $map:02000001$ 왕궁에 보관되어 있을 테지만 왕실 관계자들은 알현식 취소로 모두 정신이 없어 제대로 대답해줄 수 있는 사람이 없을 거라고 말한다. 하지만 수인에 관련된 유물이라면, $map:02000001$의 정보를 많이 알고 있는 수인 $npc:11000003$$pp:가,이$ 정보를 알고 있을지도 모른다는데… $npc:11000160$$pp:가,이$ 가르쳐준 대로 $npc:11000003$$pp:를,을$ 만나러 가보자.

quest.name: 틴차이의 연락
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001707$가 할 말이 있다고 하니 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 가이던스의 옛 제자
quest.desc: 알고 보니 $map:52000041$은 예전에 $npc:11001716$, $npc:11001707$$pp:와,과$ 함께 가이던스에서 수행자 생활을 했던 호랑이 수인 타이그 퓨리안이 마련한 거라고 한다. $npc:11001707$$pp:는,은$ 타이그 퓨리안을 만나 신기에 대한 정보를 모으는 것을 도와달라고 해야겠다고 한다. 다부지고 날렵한 몸매, 호탕한 성격의 호랑이 수인이라는 그를 찾으려면 같은 호랑이 수인에게 물어보는 것이 빠르지 않을까? 일단 $npc:11000003$에게 가서 타이그 퓨리안에 대해 물어보자.

quest.name: 타이그 퓨리안
quest.desc: $npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 과거 가이던스에서 수행을 쌓았던 타이그 퓨리안이 바로 자기라고 말한다. 아무리 봐도 $npc:11001707$$pp:가,이$ 말한 모습과는 거리가 있어 보이는데… $npc:11001716$$pp:와,과$ $npc:11001707$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000001$에 와 있다는 것을 듣고 놀란 $npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 너울빛 산에서 벌어진 사건을 전해 듣고 우리를 돕겠다고 한다. 우선 $npc:11001707$$pp:를,을$ 만나보고 싶다는데… $map:52000041$에서 그들의 재회에 함께 하자.

quest.name: 단서를 찾아라
quest.desc: 자리를 박차고 나가버린 $npc:11001003$. 그 때문에 $npc:11001707$는 $npc:11000003$에게 가이던스의 신기와 관련된 정보를 함께 수집하자는 말을 하지 못했다. $npc:11001707$ 대신 $npc:11000003$를 찾아가 정보 수집을 도와달라고 말하자.

quest.name: 넬프가 남긴 것
quest.desc: 가이던스의 신기에 대한 정보, 그리고 무기고 도난 사건의 전말을 말해줄 수 있는 사람이었던 $npc:11000492$$pp:가,이$ 쓰러져 있다. 아쉽게도 $npc:11000492$에겐 이제 아무 말도 들을 수 없게 된 것 같다. 혹시 단서가 될 만한 것이 있는지 $npc:11000492$의 주변을 살펴보자.

quest.name: 새로운 단서
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$에게 가서 $npc:11000492$의 가방에서 발견한 수첩을 보여주며 그동안의 조사 결과를 보고하고, 신기에 대한 정보 수집에 도움을 줄 것을 요청하자.

quest.name: 대제자의 호출
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$가 $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001716$의 분노를 사고 싶지 않으면 얼른 뛰어오라는 $npc:11001707$… 어서 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 사형들을 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 중간 보고
quest.desc: 여태까지의 조사 내용에 대해 묻는 $npc:11001716$. 복잡한 사건들에 휘말렸던 이야기를 하면 인간에 대한 거부감이 있는 $npcName:11001716$$pp:는,은$ 분명 싫어할 터. 그래서 간단하게만 보고했더니, 그는 시원치 않은 표정이다.

quest.name: 틴차이의 부름
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001707$가 할 말이 있다고 하니 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 특별한 창고
quest.desc: 정보원과 함께 조사를 진행한 $npc:11001707$의 말에 따르면, $map:02000216$을 운영하는 흑성회에게는 특별한 고객에게만 물건을 미리 보여주고 구입할 수 있게 하는 특별한 비밀 창고가 있다고 한다. 마침 요즘 통 큰 고객이 있어 흑성회의 경비가 허술한 참이라고 하니, 그 곳에서 가이던스의 신기와 관련된 무언가의 단서를 수집할 수 있을지도 모른다는데… 일단 $map:02000216$으로 가서 $npc:11001730$와 만나보자.

quest.name: 잠입 조사
quest.desc: 흑성회의 $map:52000042$를 감시하고 있던 $npc:11001730$$pp:는,은$ 단 한 명 남아있던 경호원을 화장실에 가둬버렸다며, 지금이 $map:52000042$$pp:를,을$ 조사할 절호의 기회라고 한다. $map:52000042$의 입구는 $npc:11001730$$pp:가,이$ 있는 물탱크 옆 검은 지붕의 흰색 건물 1층이다.
quest.manual: $npc:11001730$$pp:가,이$ 있는 물탱크 옆 검은 지붕의 흰색 건물 1층의 $map:52000042$에 들어가 단서 찾기

quest.name: 의심의 씨앗
quest.desc: 찾아낸 것은 $item:30000562$. 글을 읽지 못하는 $npc:11001730$$pp:를,을$ 위해 소리내어 읽어주며 함께 확인한 대장의 내용 중 휴머노이드 공학 연구 기관으로 알려진 비욘드 링크라는 곳이 수상하다. 어쩐지 낯설지 않은 느낌도 드는데…. 일단 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 사형들과 함께 상의해보자.

quest.name: 틴차이의 호출
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001707$가 할 말이 있다고 하니 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 수상한 연구기관
quest.desc: $npc:11001707$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000562$의 내용과 물류의 흐름을 확인해 조사한 내용 중 두 가지가 특히 수상하다고 한다. 구입한 유물들을 어디론가 빼돌리고 있는 골두스 회장, 그리고 공학 기술을 연구하는 기관이라면서 유물을 사 모으고 있는 비욘드 링크. $npc:11000252$에 대한 조사는 $npc:11001707$$pp:가,이$가 맡는다고 하니, 나는 비욘드 링크에 대한 조사를 하면 될 것 같다. $map:03000145$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11001731$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 그곳에 숨겨진 것
quest.desc: $map:03000145$에서 비욘드 링크 산하의 건물을 관찰하고 있던 $npc:11001731$은 자신이 유일하게 조사해보지 못한 곳이 있다며 그곳을 조사해 보라고 말한다. $map:52000039$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가보자.

quest.name: 시크릿 파일
quest.desc: $map:52000039$$pp:를,을$ 지나 들어온 $map:52000040$. 그곳의 $npc:11001692$$pp:를,을$ 조작하자 시크릿 파일을 열람할 수 있었다. 내용을 확인해보자.

quest.name: 로스트 차일드
quest.desc: '로스트 차일드'… 습격한 검은 그림자들을 물리친 후 눈앞이 어지러워짐을 느끼고… 정신을 차려 보니 그곳은 전에도 와본 적이 있었던 $map:52000017$이었다. 눈앞에 있는 $npc:11001723$… 시크릿 파일과 아득한 기억의 저편을 더듬어 끌어올린 몇 가지 단어들에 대한 질문을 해 보지만, 명확한 대답은 커녕 모두 잊으라는 말만 반복할 뿐이다. 과연 $npc:11001723$의 존재는 무엇이며, 흐릿한 과거의 기억은 언제쯤 온전히 돌아올 수 있을까.

quest.name: 또 하나의 엇갈림
quest.desc: 미묘한 순간에서 두 번째 만나게 된 $npc:11001724$$pp:와,과$ 그 일행. 자신들이 납득할 만한 설명을 하거나, 그 이상의 가치가 있는 정보를 줄 것을 요구한다. 오래 시간을 끌면 또 무슨 일이 생길지 알 수 없는 상황인데… 일단 빠른 시간 안에 그들에게 내가 알고 있는 비욘드 링크에 대한 정보 중 알려줄 수 있는 선까지의 정보를 최대한 알려주고 오해를 풀었다. 서둘러 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 사형들을 만나자.
quest.manual: $map:52000040$에서 $npc:11001724$$pp:와,과$ 대화해 그동안 쌓인 오해를 풀고 그곳을 빠져나가기

quest.name: 신중한 제자들
quest.desc: 비욘드 링크에서 열람한 시크릿 파일의 내용을 알려주자, $npc:11001707$$pp:는,은$ 단서들을 정리해 결론을 찾아내겠다며 깊은 생각에 잠긴다. 사형들에게 미처 모든 이야기를 전할 수 없기에 마음 한구석이 불편하지만, 이런 마음은 최대한 감추는 것이 좋겠다. 할 말이 있는 듯한 $npcName:11001716$$pp:와,과$ 대화해 보자.

quest.name: 틴차이의 발견
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001707$가 할 말이 있다고 하니 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 듣고 싶었던 말
quest.desc: $map:02000039$에 있을 신성한 공간을 찾아 떠나기 전, $npcName:11001716$$pp:는,은$ 비욘드 링크가 칸두라에 의해 움직이는 조직임을 확인했다고 말한다. 그동안 무언가 추가로 알아내거나 기억난 것이 없냐고 묻는 $npcName:11001716$. 고민 끝에 대답을 피했다. 채비를 하고 $map:02000039$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 신성한 공간으로 통하는 입구를 찾아보자.
quest.manual: $map:02000039$에서 신성한 공간으로 통하는 입구 찾아 들어가기

quest.name: 살눈 내린 터
quest.desc: $map:63000025$$pp:와,과$ 닮아, 묘하게 그리운 기분이 드는 $map:52000043$. 이곳에서는 분명히 무언가 찾아낼 수 있을 것 같다고 $npc:11001707$$pp:는,은$ 말한다. 그녀의 말대로 $map:52000043$$pp:를,을$ 수색해 보자.

quest.name: 그림자의 습격
quest.desc: $npc:11001707$$pp:는,은$ 이전에 마스터가 이 향로를 '무나크라의 빛'이라 불렀다며, 이것은 신기는 아니지만 빛을 찾는 길잡이가 되어주는 것이라고 말한 적이 있다고 알려준다. 마스터가 없는 지금, 마스터의 애니마르를 이어받은 자가 무나크라의 빛에 애니마르의 힘을 불어넣으면 빛을 밝힐 수 있을 거라고 말하는 $npc:11001707$. 그녀의 말대로 무나크라의 빛을 밝혀 보자.
quest.manual: $map:52000043$에서 신성한 향로, 무나크라의 빛을 반응시키기|$map:52000043$에 나타난 적들을 모두 처치하기

quest.name: 대제자의 분노
quest.desc: $npcName:11001716$$pp:가,이$ 다소 예민한 듯 보이지만 이해하고, 무나크라의 빛을 가지고 거처로 돌아가 천천히 이야기하는 것이 좋겠다고 말하는 $npc:11001707$. 하지만 이미 향로는 사라지고 없었다. $npcName:11001716$$pp:는,은$ 크게 분노해 비욘드 링크, 그리고 $npc:23000081$와 관련되어 있음에도 자신들에게 이 정보를 숨긴 이유가 무엇이냐고 따져 묻는다. 더이상 보고 싶지 않다며 눈앞에서 사라지라고 거칠게 말하는 $npc:11001716$. 잠시 밖으로 나와 마음을 진정시킨 후, $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 사형들을 만나보자.

quest.name: 위험에 빠진 근위병
quest.desc: 겁에 질려 도움을 요청하는 $npc:11001838$. 길을 막고 있는 무시무시한 녀석들을 좀 처치해 달라고 부탁하는데… 애처로운 그의 눈빛을 보니 진심으로 무서워하는 것 같다. 사람 하나 살리는 셈 치고, 그의 부탁을 들어주자.

quest.name: 조디의 선물
quest.desc: $npc:11001838$$pp:는,은$ 굉장히 고마워하며 선물을 건넨다. 신병 훈련소에서 낙제점을 받아 정식 근위대원이 되지 못한 그가 마지막으로 잡은 기회인 암허스트 수송선 호위 업무를 잘 해낼 수 있도록 응원해 주자.

quest.name: 트라이아로 가는 방법
quest.desc: 자신이 도울 수 있는 게 있다면 말해달라는 $npc:11001838$. $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가는 방법을 묻자 최근 크고작은 풍랑 때문에 작은 배로는 갈 수 없으니, $map:63000001$ 알현식 축하 사절단의 배를 타는 것이 좋겠다고 한다. 배를 타는 방법을 알아보기 위해 $npcTitle:11000052$ $npcName:11000052$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 암허스트의 자랑
quest.desc: $npc:11000052$에게 배를 태워달라고 부탁하자, 그는 탐탁찮은 얼굴로 알현식 축하 사절단은 $map:02000001$에 가서 $map:63000001$$pp:를,을$ 널리 알릴 사명을 띠고 있으며 자신 역시 열심히 준비를 해왔다고 말한다. 일단 준비된 배에 자리가 넉넉치 않을 수 있으니 뱃사공 $npcName:11000016$$pp:와,과$ 이야기를 해 보라고 하는데…

quest.name: 촌장의 바람
quest.desc: 배에 자리가 있는지 $npc:11000016$에게 물어보자, 촌장이 원하는 게 있을 거라며 그의 부탁을 들어주면 일이 쉽게 풀릴 수 있을 거라고 말한다. 촌장에게 가 부탁을 들어주겠다고 말해 보자.

quest.name: 아름다운 알
quest.desc: 진귀하기로 유명한 딱딱새의 알을 $map:63000001$ 명물로 소개하고 싶다는 $npc:11000052$. 하지만 딱딱새는 너무나도 찾기 어려운 존재라고 하는데… 보물 찾는 느낌을 살려 알도 찾아다 달라고 부탁하며, 성공만 한다면 배에 반드시 태워주겠다고 말하는 $npc:11000052$. 선착장 앞으로 나가, 그나마 딱딱새에 대해 좀 알고 있다는 마을 토박이 $npc:11000021$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 딱딱새에 대한 소문
quest.desc: $npc:11000021$$pp:는,은$ 딱딱새는 굉장히 찾기 힘든 존재라고 단서를 달며 마을에 전해오던 이야기를 들려준다. 지대가 높고 물이 맑은 곳에 산다는 딱딱새를 찾아, $map:63000003$ 뒤에 난 길을 따라 뒷산 폭포로 올라가 보자.
quest.complete: $map:63000001$ 높은 곳에서 딱딱새의 흔적을 찾는 $npc:11001839$$pp:와,과$ 대화하기

quest.name: 알을 찾아서
quest.desc: $npc:11001838$$pp:는,은$ 암벽 위에 신기한 새가 나타나 무언가 하다가 높이 날아가는 것을 목격했다고 한다. 하지만 높은 곳이 무서워 더이상 올라갈 수 없다고 하는데… 벽 위로 올라가 무엇이 있는지 확인해보자.
quest.manual: 암벽 위 딱딱새의 둥지에서 알 찾아보기

quest.name: 사절단 출발
quest.desc: $npc:11001838$$pp:는,은$ 크게 기뻐하며 $item:30000598$$pp:를,을$ $npc:11000052$에게 가져다 주면 되겠다고 한다. 자신은 무서우니 먼저 내려가라고 하는데… $map:63000003$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 $npc:11000052$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 새로운 출발
quest.desc: 배에서 내리자마자 만난 $npc:11000096$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11001839$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000068$$pp2:로,으로$ 와달라는 말을 남기고 계단 위로 뛰어가 버렸다고 말한다. 하지만 $map:02000068$$pp:가,이$ 어디인지는 모른다는데… 이 마을 주민으로 보이는 남자, $npc:11000022$에게 말을 걸어보자.

quest.name: 끊어진 길
quest.desc: $npc:11000022$$pp:는,은$ $npcName:11001839$의 이름을 듣고 반가워한다. 알고보니 둘은 어릴 때부터 친구라는 것. 겁은 많지만 매사 열심인 $npcName:11001839$가 $map:02000001$까지 무사히 가야 할텐데, 쉽지 않겠다고 말하며 $map:02000068$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 자세한 사정을 들어보라고 한다. $map:02000068$에서 $npc:11000019$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 테리의 제안
quest.desc: 알현식을 앞두고 $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가기 위해 많은 사람들이 찾아온 $map:02000062$. 하지만 지진 때문에 로얄로드가 끊어져 버려 많은 이들이 발이 묶여 버린 상태라고 하는데… 곤란해하고 있는 $npc:11000019$$pp:와,과$ 이야기해 방법을 찾아보자.

quest.name: 트라이아로 가는 지름길
quest.desc: $map:02000062$ 북서쪽에 있는 산길은 $map:02000001$$pp:와,과$ 통해 있는데, 얼마 전부터 괴상한 독초가 자라고 수면 꽃가루가 날아다니기 시작해 안전상의 이유로 폐쇄했다고 한다. 하지만 알현식에 맞춰 $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가기 위해서 선택할 수 있는 유일한 방법임에는 틀림이 없다는데… $map:02000062$ 북서쪽에서 $map:63000041$ 입구를 지키고 있는 $npc:11000024$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 그 길에서 만난 것은
quest.desc: $map:02000062$ 북서쪽에 서서 $map:63000041$ 앞을 지키고 있는 $npc:11000024$$pp:는,은$ 이미 $npcName:11001838$$pp:가,이$ $map:63000001$에서 온 일행들과 안에서 기다리고 있다고 말해준다. $map:63000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가 $npcName:11001838$$pp:와,과$ 함께 알현식이 열릴 $map:02000001$$pp:를,을$ 향해 이동하자.
quest.manual: $npc:11000024$$pp:가,이$ 알려준 대로 $map:02000062$ 북서쪽의 $map:63000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가 $npc:11001838$$pp:와,과$ 함께 $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동하기

quest.name: 사건 보고
quest.desc: 침대에 누워 신음하는 $npcName:11001841$. $npcName:11001851$$pp:와,과$ 만나자마자 쓰러져서 그녀에 대한 기억은 별로 없는 듯하다. 하지만 $map:02000001$ 근처에서 이런 습격 사건이 많이 일어났었다는 정보를 입수했다는데… 사건에 대해 자세히 보고하기 위해, 환자인 $npcName:11001841$$pp:를,을$ 대신해 $npc:11000119$$pp:를,을$ 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 근위대장의 침묵
quest.desc: 보고를 받은 $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ 고압적인 태도로 섣불리 이 일에 끼어들지 말라며 경고까지 한다. $npcName:11001841$의 정식 입대에 대해서도 어림없다는 듯한 반응을 보이는데… $npc:11001841$에게 돌아가 결과를 알려주자.

quest.name: 미심쩍은 사건들
quest.desc: $npcName:11001841$$pp:는,은$ 입원해 있는 동안 주변 사람들이 나눈 이상한 이야기들을 듣고 미심쩍은 구석이 많다고 말한다. $map:63000041$에서 만났던 $npcName:11001841$의 훈련소 동기 $npc:11001842$도 들려줄 이야기가 있다고 하는데… $map:63000042$에서 $npc:11001842$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 그날의 기억
quest.desc: $npc:11001843$$pp:는,은$ 사건 이후 근위대원들의 입단속을 시키는 등 $npc:11000119$$pp:가,이$ 평소와는 다른 모습을 보였다고 말해준다. 납득은 가지 않지만 군령은 따라야 한다고 말하며, 이상하게도 그날의 기억이 빠르게 지워지고 있는 것 같다고 말하는 $npc:11001843$.그를 걱정하는 $npc:11001841$에게 돌아가 그와 나눈 이야기를 들려주자.

quest.name: 소문을 따라서
quest.desc: 누군가가 진실을 은폐하려 하고 있다. 군령에 묶여 자유로운 조사가 불가능한 근위병들을 대신하여, 천천히 조사를 시작해볼 필요가 있겠다. 우선 근위대와 왕실의 사정에 밝은 자를 찾아 알현식 취소의 진짜 이유를 알아보는 것에서 시작하자. $npcName:11001841$$pp:가,이$ 알려준, '오고가는 정보를 많이 듣는다는' $npc:11000169$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가 아는 것이 있는지 물어보자.

quest.name: 깊어가는 고민
quest.desc: $npc:11000169$에게 고민이 있는 것 같다고 한다. $map:02000001$에서 $npc:11000169$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 신성한 바위 정령
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000055$에서 사악한 흑주술사들이 신성한 바위 정령을 타락시키려 하고 있다는 소식을 접했다며, 여력이 없는 근위대 대신 그곳을 정탐해줄 것을 요청해왔다.

quest.name: 다크윈드 지휘관의 의뢰
quest.desc: $npc:11000601$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000146$에 주둔 중인 수호군 중 다크윈드 세력에서 도움을 요청하는 이가 있었다며 $npc:11000266$$pp:를,을$ 만나보라고 한다.

quest.name: 선셋타워의 도망자
quest.desc: $npc:11000266$$pp:는,은$ 과거 전쟁용 살상무기로 개발되었던 $npc:23100055$$pp2:로,으로$ 보이는 로봇이 $map:02000099$에 나타났다는 제보가 있었다며 그곳의 상황을 살펴봐 줄 것을 부탁한다.

quest.name: 감시탑의 검은 그림자
quest.desc: $npc:11000601$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000091$ 인근에 침범한 엄청난 수의 돼지떼 때문에 농민들이 피해를 입고 있다며, 그곳에서 퇴치 작전을 펼치고 있는 $map:02000076$ $npc:11000015$$pp:를,을$ 도와달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 근위대장의 부탁
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:가,이$ 전할 말이 있다며 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000001$에서 그를 만나보자.

quest.name: 호루스의 둥지
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ 신성한 그리핀 종족의 우두머리 $npc:23100021$$pp:가,이$ 이성을 잃고 자신이 사는 산 주변을 불바다로 만들고 있으며, 이를 진정시키려는 피그밍그 부족 사람들까지 무차별로 공격하고 있다는 소식을 전한다. 그는 고민에 빠진 $npc:11000075$에게 걱정을 더해주고 싶지 않다고 말하며, $map:02000316$에서 벌어지고 있는 일을 확인해 달라고 요청해왔다.

quest.name: 근위대장의 호출
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:가,이$ 전할 말이 있다며 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000001$에서 그를 만나보자.

quest.name: 화염의 근원
quest.desc: 빅토리아 아일랜드 곳곳에 벌어지고 있는 원인불명의 화재. 그 근원으로 추정되는 장소는 용암의 샘 $map:02000079$$pp:라는,이라는$ 곳이라고 한다. 사건에 대한 촉이 좋아 단서를 잘 찾고 전투 능력이 좋은 인물에게 이 사건의 조사를 부탁하고 싶다고 말하는 $npc:11000119$. 그의 바람대로 $map:02000079$$pp:를,을$ 조사하러 가보자.
quest.manual: 화재의 원인으로 추정되는 곳, $map:02000079$$pp:를,을$ 끝까지 조사하기

quest.name: 소신있는 언론인
quest.desc: $npc:11000566$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000100$의 인권 문제에 대해 고발하고 싶어한다. 마침 메이플 TV의 $npc:11001191$$pp:가,이$ 소신 있는 PD라는 소문을 들었으니, 겉으로 나설 수 없는 자신 대신 $map:02000100$ 시청 앞의 시위대들을 만나보면 취재거리가 있을 거라고 말해달라고 한다.

quest.name: 생존을 위한 부탁
quest.desc: 교양국장과의 갈등으로 예능국으로 자리를 옮기게 된 $npc:11001191$. 새로 맡게 된 프로그램에 출연하기로 한 배우가 연락이 안 되는 탓에 굉장히 난감한 상황이라고 한다. 곤란해하던 그녀는 출연료를 줄 테니 배우 아르바이트를 해 보지 않겠냐고 하는데… 촬영 장소인 $map:02000380$$pp2:로,으로$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: Imperial Planning
quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11001969$ has sent for you. Meet her at $map:52000087$.

quest.name: Insights from the Sea
quest.desc:
$npc:11001969$ is concerned that so little is known about the enemy. You've suggested checking with the sailors of the Adventurer's Guild to see if they've heard anything in their travels.
Go to the $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$ and see what you can learn.

quest.name: The Great Explorer
quest.desc: $npcName:11000019$ doesn't know anything useful, but the famous explorer But since the famous explorer $npcName:11003080$ is staying in the $map:52000095$. Ask if he's seen anything unusual in his travels.

quest.name: An Ominous Warning
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003080$ was injured in a pirate attack and is bedridden. While he hasn't seen the forces of darkness himself, he did hear a prophecy from the siren $npcName:24003002$ about a great disaster. You've decided to travel to $map:02000391$ and hear the rumor for yourself, but you'll need a ship and a good navigator to get there.
Go to $map:02000182$ and meet with $npcName:11003082$.

quest.name: Chorrie's Bad Day
quest.desc: $npcName:11003082$ is the only navigator who can get you to the sirens. He's also being attacked by pirates in his cabin. Perhaps you should lend him a hand.

quest.name: Green-eyed Monsters
quest.desc:
$npc:23000015$ targeted $npcName:11003080$ out of jealousy. It seems the pirate captain has a thing for $npcName:24003002$...
$npcName:11003082$ doesn't want anything to do with this business, but he's agreed to help you get to $map:02000391$ out of respect for $npcName:11003080$.

quest.name: In Search of Sirens
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003082$ is ready to set sail. Go to $map:02000391$ and meet with $npcName:24003002$.
Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to the dungeon regardless of your item level.
quest.manual: Use Enter Dungeon button to go to $dungeonTitle:21022001$ and calm $npcName:24003001$ |Calm $npcName:24003002$
quest.complete: Return to $map:52000096$ in $map:02000182$ and meet with $npcName:11003082$

quest.name: A Meeting with Alvanos
quest.desc:
The sirens intend to hijack the pirates' ship. Join $npcName:24003001$ in the attack, and then meet with $npcName:24002931$.
Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to the dungeon regardless of your item level.
quest.manual: Use Enter Dungeon button to go to $dungeonTitle:21023001$ and calm $npcName:24002931$

quest.name: Guardian of the Seas
quest.desc:
$npcName:24002931$ is calming. Use $npcName:24003002$'s power to drive away the mists and have a conversation with $npcName:24002931$.
Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to the dungeon regardless of your item level.

quest.name: The Explorer and the Sea
quest.desc: Your meeting with $npcName:24002931$ was short, but it gave you plenty to think about. Meet with $npcName:11003080$ and tell him what the sirens are up to.

quest.name: A Tale Untellable
quest.desc: $npcName:11003080$ is giddy that you met $npcName:24002931$, but you can't possibly tell him about the vision you saw. Return to the $map:52000087$ in $map:02000001$ and report to Empress $npcName:11001969$.

quest.name: Captain's Calling
quest.desc: $npc:11000076$ is on a mission deep in the frozen wastes and has requested your help. Meet him at the $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$.

quest.name: Unknown Enemy
quest.desc: $npcName:11000076$ was scouting the ice cave in $map:02000260$ when he encountered the forces of darkness. A $npcName:11003062$ appeared during the fight and left the captain with his injured. Head to the $map:52000081$ and look for clues.

quest.name: The Swordsman in the Cold
quest.desc:
You were trapped and surrounded in the $map:52000081$, but the $npcName:11003062$ appeared and gave you a chance to escape. Before he vanished into the blizzard, he warned you to go no further if you value your life.
Return to the $map:52000080$ and report this to $npc:11000076$.

quest.name: The Frozen Path
quest.desc: $npc:11003054$ has heard tales of $map:52000082$ and its $npcName:11003064$. He suggests you ask $npcName:11003060$, who was a citizen of the snow kingdom that used to be here, if there's a way through the frozen path.

quest.name: The Recluse Herbalist
quest.desc: $npcName:11003060$ knows of a potion that can make you resistant to the cold of the blizzard in $map:52000082$. Another yeti, $npcName:11003063$, knows how to make it. Find him at $map:02000263$.

quest.name: Burning Breath
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003063$ is not exactly happy with his former queen. You barely managed to convince him to make you the potion.
Of course, now you have to gather the ingredients for him.

quest.name: The Wavering Queen
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003063$ made you a bottle of $item:20000451$ that will let you pass through $map:52000082$. The potion's effects are temporarily, so be sure to use it just before you enter! Once you enter the $map:52000083$, continue your investigation.
If you need more $item:20000451$, go to $npcName:11003063$ in $map:02000263$.
quest.manual: Drink $item:20000451$ and search $map:52000083$ at the end of $map:52000082$

quest.name: The Queen's Knight
quest.desc: Long ago, $npcName:11003060$ was the palace gatekeeper for the kingdom of snow. $npcName:11003065$ needs his help to get to the $map:52000085$, where $npc:11003069$ is. Since $npcName:11003065$ is injured, deliver her message to $npcName:11003060$ and go to the $map:52000085$ in her place.

quest.name: The Raging Snowstorm
quest.desc:
$npc:11003060$ says that the $map:52000085$ guards the path to the $map:52000086$, where the snow kingdom's secret treasure was kept. He's worried that the specter who appeared to $npcName:11003069$ is connected to the darkness and is using her to get the treasure.
Enter the hidden cave door in $map:02000260$ to join $npcName:11003060$ at the $map:52000084$, then investigate the $map:52000085$.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000084$ through the hidden path in $map:02000260$ and investigate $map:52000085$

quest.name: To the Temple
quest.desc: $npc:11003069$ opened the path to the temple, but the vault to the Frozen Crystal is still locked. It seems likely that the forces of darkness are manipulating events here. Get ready to leave for the $map:52000086$ with $npcName:11003060$.

quest.name: Frost and Shadow
quest.desc: Meet $npcName:11003060$ at the $map:52000086$. You can get there through the passageway on the tallest, steepest part of $map:02000263$.
quest.complete: Return to $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$ and report to $npc:11000076$

quest.name: The Captain's Concern
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000076$ is sorry that he was too busy to help with the investigation. He's also concerned that the enemy seems to preparing for something, and he has no idea what it is.
He's received recall orders back to $map:02000001$. Speak with $npcName:11003060$ in the $map:52000080$.

quest.name: Those Who Remain
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003069$ has resealed the path to the $map:02000383$ and sends you her thanks. $npcName:11003060$ will return to his business in $map:02000001$, but he'll be sure to keep an eye on things back at his old home.
Return to $map:52000087$ in $map:02000001$ and report to Empress $npcName:11001969$.

quest.name: Dilemma
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ and $npc:11000074$ can't agree on what to do about the attack on $map:02000076$. Perhaps you can provide $npc:11000075$ with an alternative solution.

quest.name: Crisis in Henesys
quest.desc:
You volunteered to provide reinforcements for $map:02000076$, which is under attack from the forces of darkness. Help $npcName:11000001$ and $npcName:11000015$ defeat the invaders.
Talk to $npcName:11000075$ in $map:52000033$ to join the battle.
quest.manual: Defend $map:52000120$ (Speak with $npcName:11000075$ in the $map:52000033$ to begin)

quest.name: Elder's Request
quest.desc: $npcName:11000015$ thanks you for defending $map:02000076$. However, the town has sustained some damage, and they need help getting back on their feet. Speak with $npc:11000001$.

quest.name: An Immature Son
quest.desc: $npcName:11000001$ wants you to bring his son $npcName:11000502$ home. As one of the Seven Heroes, it seems the elder holds his son to extremely high expectations, and now he's worried the boy will do something rash. $npcName:11000502$ may be at $map:02000027$.

quest.name: In Search of Armano
quest.desc: $npc:11000273$ claims that $npcName:11000502$ hasn't been in to see him all day. $npcName:11000961$ is supposedly $npcName:11000502$'s childhood friend. You may as well deliver the doctor's $item:30000767$ to her in $map:02000076$ when you go to question her.
quest.manual: Search the cabinet in $map:02000027$ and take $item:30000767$

quest.name: The Hero's Son
quest.desc: $npcName:11000961$ is surprised that you're looking for $npcName:11000502$. She knows he has a bad reputation, but it's because he tries so hard to live up to his father's legacy. She hasn't seen him since he fought with his father at the hospital, but she's certain he's still in $map:02000076$ somewhere.

quest.name: Henesys at a Glance
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000478$ lives at the top of the hill in $map:02000076$. He says it's easy to see what's going on in town if you look through a telescope.
If you still can't find $npcName:11000502$ after using the telescope, try asking $npcName:11000189$ if he's been by her cornfield.

quest.name: A Corny Greeting
quest.desc: $npcName:11000189$ has a mischievous streak. She'll tell you where to find what you're after... but only if you give her corn stalks a pep talk! You can greet by typing /greet in the chat window or pressing the F1 key.
quest.manual: Greet $npcName:11000189$'s corn in $map:02000076$ by pressing the F1 key or typing /greet in the chat window.

quest.name: A Helpful Fellow
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000189$ always keeps her promises, no matter how strange they are. She tells you that $npcName:11000502$ ran off to get reinforcements from Dark Wind. While he may think that's a great idea, you know that $map:02000100$ is still recovering from the attack, and Dark Wind is in no position to help out.
It seems that $npcName:11000189$'s contact is a gaudily dressed man in $map:02000083$. See if you can find him.

quest.name: Den of Thieves
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000101$ is trying to pretend he doesn't know $npcName:11000502$. Luckily for you, he's also a complete idiot. It was easy to get the information you needed from him.
It sounds like $npcName:11000502$ is being held in $map:02000243$. You'll have to go through $map:02000241$ to get there.

quest.name: The Dupe
quest.desc: $npcName:11000173$ confesses to trying to kidnap $npcName:11000502$. However, the elder's son slipped away in the chaos and escaped to $map:02000134$.

quest.name: Never Empty-handed
quest.desc: $npcName:11000502$ went into the $map:02000224$ in $map:02000134$. He refuses to go home until you get the $itemPlural:20000050$ from the monsters there.

quest.name: Another Crisis
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000502$ finally agreed to go home, but only if you remembered the fact that he was the real hero today. You were about to agree when $npcName:11000961$ suddenly appeared. It seems $npcName:11000001$ has gone to face the remaining forces of darkness himself.
$npcName:11000502$ has a worrying fire burning in his eyes. Hurry to $map:02000054$.

quest.name: A Father's Heart
quest.desc: You reached $map:02000054$, where $npcName:11000961$'s sister-in-arms $npcName:11000786$ is wounded. $npcName:11000001$ and $npcName:11000015$ are outgunned in $map:52000121$. Hurry to their side!

quest.name: A Late Regret
quest.desc: $npcName:11000001$ was injured protecting his son. $npcName:11000502$ wanted to seek revenge, but $npcName:11000015$ and $npcName:11000119$ stopped him. While he's off sulking, you should find out what $npcName:11001838$ is doing here.

quest.name: The Next Plan
quest.desc: $npcName:11001838$ is thrilled that he's one step closer to being a real guard, but he's not any closer to reaching $npc:11000119$'s standards. Speak with $npcName:11000119$ about your next moves.

quest.name: Farewell for Now
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001838$ is surprised that you volunteered to go to the $map:02000146$. He promises that he'll become a great guard someday.
Hurry to the $map:02000146$ and meet $npc:11000076$.

quest.name: Shadow Research
quest.desc:
The work at the $map:02000146$ isn't going very well. You can help by getting $npcName:11000264$ some materials for his research.
Gather $itemPlural:20000047$ from the monsters at the center of the $map:02000146$, then bring them to $npcName:11000264$.

quest.name: The Research Resumes
quest.desc: $npcName:11000264$ is impressed that you collected the $itemPlural:20000047$ so quickly. As you were discussing the situation, $npcName:11000032$ of $map:02000023$ appeared. See what he wants.

quest.name: A Dark Threat
quest.desc: The $map:02000146$ used to be the Door of Light. $npcName:11000032$'s research is about finding a way to fight the darkness that is threatening the world. Now that $npcName:11000264$ is done analyzing the $itemPlural:20000047$, see what he's learned.

quest.name: A Blue Light in the Darkness
quest.desc: It seems that an unknown glowing substance is either a byproduct or component of $item:20000047$. $npcName:11000264$ has never seen anything like it, but when he questioned $npcName:11000032$ on the matter, $npcName:11000032$ merely asked him if the $itemPlural:20000016$ were ready.

quest.name: The Most Dangerous Garden
quest.desc:
$itemPlural:20000016$ are made from the $itemPlural:20000045$ that thrive in this place. They're usually hard to farm, but $npcName:11000032$ managed to make a patch of magical soil that they grow in. The $itemPlural:20000045$ would be a piece of cake to harvest... if it weren't for the monsters crowding the garden in front of the $map:02000026$.
Go pick some $itemPlural:20000045$ for $npcName:11000264$.
quest.manual: Pick $itemPlural:20000045$ in garden of the $map:02000026$ at the $map:02000146$

quest.name: The Amazing Invention
quest.desc: $npcName:11000264$ claims that his new medicine formula is super effective and easy to make. Put the $itemPlural:20000045$ in the mixer and try making the $itemPlural:20000016$ yourself.

quest.name: An Unknown Substance
quest.desc: $npcName:11000032$ is returning to $map:02000023$ to confer with the headmaster, $npc:11000031$. Speak with him to come along.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000031$ in $map:52000134$ (If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ again to return.)

quest.name: Fruits of Research
quest.desc:
$npc:11000031$, the headmaster of $map:52000133$, welcomes you to the campus. Listen in as $npcName:11000032$'s delivers his report.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003282$ in $map:52000134$ (If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ again to return.)

quest.name: Einos's Hypothesis
quest.desc: $npcName:11000032$ believes that the substance coming from the $item:20000045$ is the means by which the power of darkness spreads, and he thinks he can prove it. Go to $map:52000135$ and observe his experiment.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003250$ in $map:52000135$ (If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ again to return.)

quest.name: The Excellent Student
quest.desc:
The forces of darkness have attacked $map:02000023$, but $npc:11000031$ managed to keep $map:02000023$ safe with a magical shield. His strength is waning, so you need to hurry.
At $npcName:11000031$'s request, work with the academy's star citizen in $map:52000101$.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ again to return.
quest.complete: Meet the academy's star student at $map:52000133$ (If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ to return.)

quest.name: A Fresh Start
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003146$, star student of $map:52000101$, insists that you purify your body in the spring since you've picked up all kinds of minor curses while fighting the darkness. Take a nice, relaxing soak.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ again to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003146$ in $map:52000133$ (If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ again to return.)

quest.name: Totem Repair Duty
quest.desc:
The barrier around the academy is reinforced by magic totems. These totems are especially fragile, so the students of Ellinel often have to repair them. $npcName:11003146$ sent $npcName:11000284$ to $map:02000006$ to do some totem repairs, but she hasn't come back. Check in with her close underclassman, $npcName:11000029$, in $map:02000023$.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ again to return.

quest.name: Cheer Up, Arwen
quest.desc: $npcName:11000029$ admits that $npcName:11000284$ can be slow sometimes, but it's only because she wants to do a good job. It's possible she's still in $map:02000006$. Take the $item:30000768$ and travel to $map:02000006$ to meet $npcName:11000284$.

quest.name: Unexpected Difficulties
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000284$ visited one of the locals, $npcName:11000304$, for help. Unfortunately, $npcName:11000304$ doesn't seem to want any visitors. If you defeat the $npcPlural:33000006$ that are roaming the area, it might prove your good intentions to her.
Once you're done with the monsters, find $npcName:11000304$ in the $map:02000073$.

quest.name: The Witch's Riddle
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000304$ ridiculed $npcName:11000284$ for failing to solve the riddle. Now it's your turn:
"Two divine creatures lost their hearts when darkness fell. End their pain and redeem the forsaken soul"
What does this riddle mean? Return to $npcName:11000284$ and find the answer together.

quest.name: The Wrong Answer
quest.desc: $npcName:11000284$ thought she had the answer, but she failed. Her answer makes some sense to you, so you've left to investigate. Search the $map:02000074$.

quest.name: The Forsaken
quest.desc:
You bumped into $npcName:11003146$ in the $map:02000074$, and she figured out the answer to the riddle in a snap.
Go to $map:02000089$ and defeat $npcName:22000038$. Once that's done, meet with $npcName:11000285$.

quest.name: A Turtle's Tears
quest.desc: $npcName:11000285$ is heartbroken. The day the darkness fell, monsters trampled over the precious flowers that mark the memory of his true love. Save the dying flowers on his behalf.

quest.name: The Soul Key
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000285$ remembers a mage who dealt in forbidden magic to be with the one he loved. Even when the world called him a villain, he wanted his power to make the world a better place. His power is still hidden in the place where he fell...
Could this power be the thing that's hiding in the $map:02000074$? Return to the $map:02000074$ in $map:02000006$.

quest.name: Box of Magic
quest.desc: $npcName:11003146$ is gone, but she's left a note behind, as well as some sort of magical box. She also writes that the riddle was easy for her because she's great, and not because $npcName:11000284$ is lacking in any way. For now, check out the box in the $map:02000074$ in $map:02000006$ and then meet $npcName:11000284$ in $map:02000006$.
quest.manual: Check the magic box in the $map:02000074$ in $map:02000006$.

quest.name: The Aid of the Light
quest.desc: The magic box you found is now a totem supporting the headmaster's magic barrier. $npcName:11000284$ is relieved that the situation is finally resolved. Head back to $map:02000023$ and report to $npcName:11000033$.

quest.name: Attack from Within
quest.desc: $npcName:11000033$ says that something has started attacking the barrier from within. He suspects the disturbance is coming from $map:02000312$, an old dark fairy temple. He sent one of his students, $npcName:11000876$, to $map:02000024$ to check it out.

quest.name: Sweet Tooth
quest.desc: $npcName:11000876$ asked $npcName:11000293$, the eldest of the creatures here, for clues, but $npcName:11000293$ simply smiled. $npcName:11000876$ is certain that some sweets will jog the creature's memory. Defeat the monsters in $map:02000024$ and gather $itemPlural:20000052$ from the nearby boxes.

quest.name: The Seed of Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11000293$ feels good after eating the $itemPlural:20000052$. He recalls seeing the entrance to $map:02000312$ behind the waterfall at the center of this place. Complete your investigation, then return to $npcName:11000033$ in $map:02000023$.

quest.name: Ellinel Express
quest.desc: You need to report your findings to $npc:11000031$. To get back to Ellinel, you need to take the Ellinel Express from $map:02000023$. Apparently, you'll need to find the littlest mage in $map:02000023$ to depart.

quest.name: The Mages of Ellinel
quest.desc:
The littlest mage in $map:02000023$ is $npcName:11003257$, a pretty kitty on a red cushion. After traveling via the Ellinel Express, you met $npcName:11003146$ in $map:52000101$. She tried to drop more work in your lap, but $npcName:11000032$ appeared and asked her to get a report from you.
$npcName:11003146$ is fuming. Go ahead and talk to her.

quest.name: The Missing Child
quest.desc:
One of the elementary students, $npcName:11001165$, got into the lab storage room and stole an experimental potion. He left behind a note claiming that he'll be a great hero someday... but $npcName:11000032$ is worried that the stolen potion is actually a shadow reagent that could take the child's life.
Meet with $npcName:11001167$, who is looking for his younger brother in $map:02000101$.

quest.name: Dang Kids
quest.desc: $npcName:11001166$'s older brother, $npcName:11001167$, is worried because his attempts to frighten his little brother straight only made the kid more bold. He'll search to the north while you search to the south of $map:02000101$.

quest.name: Think of the Children
quest.desc: $npcName:11001166$ and his friends went into the forest to investigate some shadows he saw, but they got separated. He made it out, but his friends are still in there. Enter $map:02000331$ and help $npcName:11001166$ save his fellow kids.

quest.name: A Child's Request
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003253$ confesses that she drank the potion $npcName:11001166$ brought, thinking it was a mana potion. She also wants to know what kind of snacks $npcName:11003257$ likes...
Speak with $npcName:11003257$ to return to Ellinel.

quest.name: Ellinel in Shadow
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003257$ says that a huge cloud of dark magic is covering Ellinel, blinding her to whatever is happening in the campus. Her attempt to teleport you directly to $npcName:11000032$ failed, though she thinks she can get you to $npcName:11003146$.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003146$ in $map:52000100$ (If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.)

quest.name: Two Faces of Einos
quest.desc:
Darkness has engulfed $map:52000136$ and driven $npcName:11000032$ into a feral rage. $npcName:11003146$ is still in shock and doesn't know what to do with herself. Shadow magic flows from $map:52000137$, where only $npcName:11000031$ and $npcName:11000032$ remain. It's time for you to see this for yourself.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.manual: Fight the dark creature in $map:52000137$ (If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.)

quest.name: Whereabouts Unknown
quest.desc:
The scholars of Ellinel believe $npcName:11000032$'s transformation is related to his research. Based on her research as $map:02000001$'s head librarian, $npcName:11000005$ suspects that a shadow seed may have been involved. The mere suggestion seems to have upset $npcName:11003146$...
Finish your conversation with $npcName:11000005$.

quest.name: What's Left Behind
quest.desc: $npcName:11000005$ is convinced that a mage of $npcName:11000032$'s caliber would have noticed the changes he was undergoing. It's impossible to return to Ellinel, but he did maintain an off-site workspace in $map:02000109$. Search for any records or notes while $npcName:11000033$ and $npcName:11000005$ work on restoring the Ellinel Express.

quest.name: The Source of Darkness
quest.desc: You found $npcName:11003265$ in a hidden compartment. According to these notes, the strange blue light found on many of the objects and substances around the $map:02000146$ is actually a contagious form of darkness. This power is focused and spreading from the $map:02000326$. Hurry there and cut off the supply of darkness before it spreads further.
quest.manual: Search the space behind the waterfall

quest.name: Spreading Danger
quest.desc:
While reading $npcName:11000032$'s notes, you found evidence that someone else had already been there—including a lost $item:30000769$. You'll have to be sure to give it back to $npcName:11003146$ when you see her again.
Hurry to the $map:02000146$ and warn $npcName:11000076$ of the danger.

quest.name: A Critical Moment
quest.desc: You arrived at the $map:02000146$, but $npc:11000076$ was already on a mission to the $map:02000213$ to investigate. Hurry there and defeat whoever is behind this spreading darkness.
quest.manual: Defeat the source of darkness at the $dungeonTitle:20006001$

quest.name: The Flow of Darkness
quest.desc:
$npc:11000076$ has brought you up to speed on the happenings around the $map:02000146$. The monster attacks are growing more vicious, and a new disease is spreading alongside the shadow poisons. Thus far, only $npcName:11000264$ and his research associates have managed to slow the infection.
Speak with $npcName:11000264$.

quest.name: A Bright New Crisis
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000264$ is shocked after hearing about what happened in $map:02000023$.
$npc:11000076$ wants to talk strategy.

quest.name: A Regret Too Late
quest.desc: Return to the $map:02000146$ and tell $npc:11000076$ about the loss of another one of the Seven Heroes.

quest.name: The Guard Captain's Request
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ has requested your help in $map:02000001$. What's so urgent that the captain of the guard needs your help?

quest.name: Capital Crisis
quest.desc: Go to $map:02000001$ and meet with $npc:11000119$.

quest.name: Under the Palace
quest.desc: $npcName:11000057$ and her minions have kidnapped $npc:11000074$ and vanished into the $map:02000252$. While the guard prepare their assault, go to the $map:02000252$ and keep an eye on $npcName:11000057$'s forces.

quest.name: A Meeting with the Minister
quest.desc: $npcName:11000119$ says that $npc:11000074$ wants to thank you, and suggests that you go meet him. Go to the $map:02000065$ in $map:02000001$ and meet with $npcName:11000074$.

quest.name: The Minister's Choice
quest.desc: $npcName:11000057$ is $npcName:11000074$'s daughter. While he is a loyalist to the throne, she seeks to spread chaos and uproot the empire. He asks you not to tell anyone else that $npcName:11000057$ was here, but you can't shake the feeling that there's something he's not telling you...

quest.name: Royal Magics
quest.desc: $npcName:11003432$ has come to $npcName:11000074$'s office to borrow the Scroll of $map:02000001$, a manuscript kept by the royal mages. He had it hidden in $map:02000218$ to keep it safe from thieves. Go fetch it while $npcName:11003432$ and $npcName:11000074$ discuss another important matter.

quest.name: Mind of a Minister
quest.desc: $npcName:11000530$ gave you the $item:30000870$, and asked you to give the minister his regards. Return to $npcName:11003432$ in the $map:02000065$.
quest.complete: Return to $map:02000065$ in $map:02000001$ and speak with $npcName:11003432$

quest.name: Happy News
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003432$ has invited you to go with her to see $npcName:11000032$, who's suddenly returned.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
