quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003433$ in $map:52000102$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return</font>

quest.name: The Return of Einos
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000032$ is recovering in the $map:52000149$ and still hasn't woken up. Go see how he's doing.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003438$ inside the $map:52000149$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return</font>

quest.name: The Unspeakable Truth
quest.desc:
According to $npcName:11003433$'s research, a great divine being placed an emissary in every dimension to guide and direct that world. These so-called "Innocents" possess the capability for both good and evil, and at some point must choose which of the two they will follow.
He thinks that $npcName:11000032$ is one of these Innocents, and that exposure to the Land of Darkness caused his evil side to temporarily awaken. He's asked you to keep this a secret for now, in order to prevent panic from spreading through $map:02000023$.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003433$ in the $map:52000149$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return</font>

quest.name: Life Magic: Study 1
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003433$ is researching life magic in hopes of finding a way to cure $npcName:11000032$. First, he needs $item:30000179$. Find some for him while he reviews the book $npcName:11003432$ borrowed on his behalf.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.

quest.name: Life Magic: Study 2
quest.desc: $npcName:11000033$ needs $itemPlural:30000871$ from the $map:02000012$ in the $map:02000128$.

quest.name: Life Magic: Study 3
quest.desc: The last item $npcName:11000033$ needs for his treatment is $item:30000190$. Get it from $npcName:23100025$ in the $map:02000206$.

quest.name: A Twisted Road
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003442$ attempted to teleport you to $npcName:11000033$ for the healing ritual, but some sort of interference caused you to appear in the $map:52000150$, instead.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000033$ in $map:52000150$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return</font>

quest.name: Seed of Uncertainty
quest.desc:
While $npcName:11003438$ was moving $npcName:11000032$ to the $map:02000179$, his teleportation spell was blocked and he had to take a detour through the $map:52000150$. Hold off the attacking monsters while he keeps $npcName:11000032$ safe.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11003440$ in $map:52000150$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return</font>

quest.name: Defend the Forest
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000068$ is trying to enter the $map:02000179$ through the $map:02000066$. If he succeeds, all of $map:02000023$ will be in danger!
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000033$ in $map:02000179$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return</font>

quest.name: Shrouded in Mystery
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003439$ needs a book called the "Dimensional Dictionary" to cross-reference his research on the Innocents. Unfortunately, the book's owner doesn't seem keen to lend it out. See if you can convince $npcName:11000282$ of the $map:02000019$ in $map:02000215$ to part ways with it.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.

quest.name: The Librarian's Game
quest.desc: $npcName:11000282$ thinks you're no better than a thief for somehow knowing what books he has without asking first. However, if you can find the Dimensional Dictionary on your own, he may be willing to talk. Search inside the $map:02000019$.

quest.name: The Magic of Reading
quest.desc:
Someone has put a book in the wrong bookcase, and the $npcName:11000670$ is quite perturbed about the whole matter. Take the $item:30000082$ from the bookcase and return it to its proper location.
You'll need to get the key to the bookcase from a $npcName:21000216$.

quest.name: The Hidden Room
quest.desc: The Dimensional Dictionary has been enchanted so that nobody can read it. Even $npcName:11000282$, the book's owner, has no idea what it says. If you can come up with a way to dispel the enchantment, maybe you could convince him to lend it to you...

quest.name: Clash of Wills
quest.desc: $npcName:11000705$ of the $map:02000129$ knows how to remove the enchantment on the Dimensional Dictionary, but she's refused to help $npcName:11000282$ do it. Perhaps you can convince her to help you, instead.

quest.name: The Lost Ladle
quest.desc: Mischievous monsters have stolen $npcName:11000705$'s cooking utensil and hid it near $map:02000129$'s waterfall. Find $item:30000204$ on her behalf.
quest.manual: Find $item:30000204$ in the grass near $map:02000129$'s waterfall

quest.name: A Word to the Wise
quest.desc:
According to $npcName:11000705$, you need $npc:22000007$'s $item:30000186$ in order to read the Dimensional Dictionary. She's also insistent that you be the one to open the book when you get it...
Head to $map:02000180$ and get the $item:30000186$.

quest.name: The Livid Librarian
quest.desc: $npcName:11000282$ has agreed to let you read the Dimensional Dictionary with him in the $map:02000219$. Remember, you are supposed to open the book first.

quest.name: The Librarian's Defeat
quest.desc: $npcName:11003444$ is frustrated because he still can't read the book. He's agreed to lend it to you under the condition that you return with a transcription. It's time to return to $map:02000023$ and meet with $npcName:11000033$.

quest.name: Deciphering the Meaning
quest.desc:
Not even $npcName:11000033$ could read the book! There's a chance that $npcName:11000032$ is immune to the effects of the enchantment. Show him the Dimensional Dictionary.
If you leave by mistake, you can talk to $npc:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Meet with $npc:11003445$ in $map:02000179$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, you can talk to $npcName:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ to return.</font>

quest.name: Dark Forces: A Study
quest.desc: $npcName:11003445$ has received reports that many of the divine creatures of Maple World have fallen under the influence of dark magic. Meet with $npcName:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ and come up with a plan to confirm this report.

quest.name: Dark Forces: Study 1
quest.desc: $npcName:11000033$ has heard that two of the ancient creatures of the forest have been acting up, and he'd like to begin by looking into $npcName:23100041$. Travel to $map:02000079$ and find out if the report is true.
quest.manual: Defeat $npc:23100041$, the ancient divine creature, in $dungeonTitle:20013001$

quest.name: Dark Forces: Study 2
quest.desc: Next, you need to check on $npcName:23100021$, who has been indiscriminately attacking passersby. Go to $map:02000316$ and see what you can learn.
quest.manual: Check on $npc:23000021$, who became wild in $dungeonTitle:20003001$

quest.name: Dark Forces: A Revelation
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000032$ needs to speak with you. Meet him in the $map:02000179$.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.complete: Meet with $npc:11003445$ in $map:02000179$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, you can talk to $npcName:11000033$ in $map:02000023$ to return.</font>

quest.name: Crystal Clarity
quest.desc:
While studying the Dimensional Dictionary, $npcName:11003445$ learned of a kind of magic crystal that can reveal answers to the questions that wear on the user's mind. He made such a crystal, so take a look.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.
quest.manual: Look into the crystal <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, you can either talk to $npcName:11000033$ or use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$</font>

quest.name: Tracking the Truth
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003445$'s crystal showed you $npcName:11000044$, who seems to be looking for $npcName:11000526$. You need to find out how he's connected to the forces of darkness... and if Dark Wind is hiding something. Go to $map:02000157$ and speak to $npc:11000065$.
If you leave by mistake, use the $npcName:11003497$ next to $npcName:11003257$ in $map:02000023$ to return.

quest.name: A Personal Request
quest.desc:
According to $npcName:11000361$, $npc:11000065$ won't see anybody without an appointment, and he's not accepting any new appointments at the moment. If you want to get to the mayor, you'll have to curry favor with $npcName:11000361$ first...
Go to $map:02000008$ and check on her younger sister, $npcName:11000868$.

quest.name: Dashed Dreams
quest.desc: $npcName:11000868$ didn't expect her job to involve so many monsters. Her boss wants a report on the monsters' physical composition, but she can't stand to go near them. Defeat them and gather $itemPlural:30000872$ for her.

quest.name: The New Hire
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000868$ wants you to deliver her report to her boss, $npcName:11000869$. She also wants you to mention how she did a great job.
Find $npcName:11000869$ in $map:02000142$.

quest.name: The Clocktower's Secret
quest.desc: Time flows more slowly around the clock tower. If this effect spreads, the whole world could be thrown into chaos. Enter the $map:02000357$ and find out what's going on.

quest.name: Budget Wars
quest.desc: $npcName:11000869$ is annoyed that he can't continue his very important research with his current budget. $npc:11000065$ pledged to support his work, but has been silent for a while. Perhaps $npcName:11000361$ would help the situation if she knew how much it was hurting her sister's career...

quest.name: Ear of the Mayor
quest.desc: Thanks to the science of time travel, your appointment with $npc:11000065$ has finally arrived. Hurry up to the $map:02000154$.

quest.name: Dark Wind's Shadow
quest.desc:
$npc:11000065$ has nothing to say about Dark Wind. He did have some cryptic advice for you, however: not everything about a hero is great, and not everyone under a leader believes in the same values.
It looks like you have no choice but to go to $map:52000073$ and speak with $npcName:11000044$ in person.

quest.name: Weight of the World
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000044$ put on a big show about $npcName:11000526$ being beneath his concern. Any attempts to bring it up causes him to start talking about the hunt for $npcName:11000064$.
Maybe it's time you track $npcName:11000064$ down and have a nice, private chat about Dark Wind.
quest.complete: Talk to the $npcName:11003446$ who came to $map:02000152$

quest.name: The Boss's Fury
quest.desc: A $npcName:11003446$ is cowering in fear from $npcName:11000044$'s anger. It seems that he's been especially furious ever since $npcName:11000069$ disappeared.

quest.name: An Order from the Boss
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ says he needs everyone's help to find $npcName:11000069$. Go to $map:02000147$ and meet with $npcName:11000258$, who was standing guard when $npc:11000069$ disappeared.

quest.name: Zipped Lips
quest.desc: $npcName:11000258$ is convinced that $npcName:11000531$ is holding out on him due to some sort of grudge against Dark Wind. Since the bookseller doesn't know you, try asking him about $npcName:11000069$.

quest.name: A Tentative Lead
quest.desc: It doesn't seem like $npcName:11000531$ will have anything useful to say. Perhaps you can trace $npcName:11000069$'s steps to find out where she is.

quest.name: Dangerous Side Gig
quest.desc: Somebody hired $npcName:11000532$ to borrow and return the books. Who would do such a thing? Could they be connected to $npcName:11000069$'s disappearance?

quest.name: In Pursuit
quest.desc: $npcName:11000301$ didn't see anyone suspicious in the area, but he did mention an area under the $map:02000045$ that would make a perfect hiding spot. This seems like a good place to continue your search.

quest.name: Perion and Yamarcha
quest.desc:
The words "Yamarcha" and "$map:02000051$" are written on a wall under the $map:02000223$. What could Yamarcha mean?
This sounds like a question for $npcName:11000005$ of the $map:52000103$.

quest.name: Library Lookup
quest.desc: The Yamarcha were an ancient tribe from $map:02000051$ who sold their souls in exchange for power. $npcName:11000005$ is thrilled at your discovery at the $map:02000223$. Help her search the library for references on $map:02000051$.

quest.name: The Final Gift
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000005$ believes that the $map:02000229$ can be found in a place known to be tainted by darkness. Perhaps whatever $npcName:11000064$ was looking for had to do with this darkness.
Use the $item:30000076$ that $npcName:11000005$ gave you to release the soul of $npcName:21900090$, who is imprisoned by the darkness. The entrance to the ruins should be in $map:02000170$.
quest.manual: Defeat monsters at $map:02000229$ |Use $item:30000076$ to free $npcName:21900090$'s soul

quest.name: An Unexpected Discovery
quest.desc: You found a suspicious bag in the $map:02000229$. Could it be $npcName:11000069$'s?

quest.name: The Story They Shared
quest.desc: The $npcName:11003483$ tells you that $npcName:11000064$ and $npcName:11000069$ were supposed to meet here, but someone got to $npcName:11000069$ first and kidnapped her. The attacker left behind a green jewel; as soon as he saw it, $npcName:11000064$ ran off by himself. Go to the $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$ and tell $npcName:11000529$ what happened.

quest.name: Unyielding Friendship
quest.desc:
According to $item:30000340$, he went to Katramus alone to save $npcName:11000069$. $npcName:11000529$ urges you to choose your next moves carefully.
It's up to you to decide what to tell $npc:11000044$. For now, go to $map:02000152$ in $map:02000100$ and meet with him.

quest.name: Run and Hide
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ wants you to go back into the streets and look for more clues. For now, meet with $npcName:11000005$ at the $map:02000031$.

quest.name: A Surprising Clue
quest.desc: $npcName:11000005$ wants to show you a letter from $npcName:11000032$, but she doesn't remember where she put it. Help her look.

quest.name: Humblis Hideout
quest.desc:
The item that $npcName:11000064$ found in the $map:02000306$ definitely belongs to $npcName:11000057$. In all likelihood, he's walking right into a trap.
This is no job for one person. Go to the $map:02000208$ and ask for help.

quest.name: Help from Humblis
quest.desc: By the time you got to his headquarters, $npcName:11000006$ was gone. Ask $npcName:11000566$ for his location.

quest.name: Real Friendship
quest.desc: $npcName:11000566$ says $npcName:11000529$ went to Katramus. If you want to join him, you'd better hurry!

quest.name: A Long Parting
quest.desc: Help $npcName:11000006$ free the slaves in $dungeonTitle:21017001$.

quest.name: Witness Protection
quest.desc: $npcName:11000529$ thanks you for your help in Katramus. Now there's a new mission to tackle: an anonymous informant claims to have critical information about $npc:11000044$'s plans. You must get to this informant before Dark Wind does.

quest.name: Cornered Witness
quest.desc: The request for help came from $map:02000279$. Meet with $npcName:11000565$ and find the informant.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: The agents of Humblis are trying to search the station, but robots keep getting in their way. The $npcName:22000042$ is particularly bad, as it has the power to shut down all the electric doors. Get rid of this nuisance. It appears in $map:02000279$ now and then.

quest.name: No Stone Unturned
quest.desc: $npcName:11001021$ wants you to search the $map:02000307$. The entrance is right behind him.

quest.name: Raymon Lives
quest.desc: The informant was $npc:11000526$... who was thought long dead! He claims that the robbery of the armory and the death of $npcName:11000492$ were all $npcName:11000044$'s doing. The proof can be found behind the wall clock in the $map:02000226$.

quest.name: Cold Hard Proof
quest.desc: $npcName:11001022$ has hidden the evidence in his office at $map:02000225$. Go to the $map:02000226$ and look behind the clock.
quest.manual: Search the wall clock in $map:02000226$ at $map:02000139$

quest.name: The Arrest
quest.desc: With $npc:11000526$'s testimony and $item:30000075$, you have more than enough evidence to prove $npcName:11000044$'s guilt. Go to the $map:02000152$ and capture him.

quest.name: Into Thin Air
quest.desc:
By the time you got to the $map:02000153$, $npcName:11000044$ was long gone. It seems he'd already seen the writing on the wall...
Return to $map:02000208$ and tell $npcName:11000529$ the news.

quest.name: Trading Fortunes
quest.desc: Bring $item:30000075$ to $npc:11000119$ in $map:02000001$. There won't be a safe place in the entire empire for $npcName:11000044$ to hide when the guard hears about this.

quest.name: The Whole Truth
quest.desc: Report to $npcName:11000075$.

quest.name: An Ally in Prison
quest.desc: $npcName:11000012$ has an important letter to deliver, but he's too terrified to face the recipient—$npcName:11000526$, who is under arrest in connection to $npcName:11000492$'s murder. Deliver the letter to the $map:02000310$.

quest.name: Nelph's Keepsake
quest.desc: $npcName:11000526$ gave you $npcName:11000492$'s keepsake, a tape containing an audio message for $npc:11000492$'s blind mother. Since he can't deliver the tape from behind bars, he's asked you to bring it to $npcName:11000178$ in $map:02000076$.

quest.name: Broken Promises
quest.desc: $npcName:11000178$ has asked you to play $item:30000342$ for her. The tape player is next to the bed in $map:02000198$.

quest.name: The New Ally
quest.desc: You haven't checked on the $map:02000146$ in a while. Seek out $npc:11000076$ at $map:02000228$.

quest.name: Lennon the Hero
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ has joined in the defense of Maple World! Meet him at $map:02000228$.

quest.name: The Underground
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ suspects that $npcName:11000044$ will use a tunnel at the $map:02000146$ to sneak into the Land of Darkness. Search the $map:02000308$.

quest.name: Facing the Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ is hot on $npcName:11000044$'s tail. Follow them into the $map:52000003$.

quest.name: Survivor's Duty
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ wants you to warn the guard that $npcName:11000044$ escaped... and that he's certain to return with more power than ever.

quest.name: Fight Another Day
quest.desc: Now that $npcName:11000044$ is beyond your reach, it's time to report to $npc:11000075$.

quest.name: The Waves' Wrath
quest.desc:
Your first mission for the Frontier Foundation is to investigate the unexplained ocean disturbances plaguing Maple World, and making the seas more treacherous.
According to $npcName:11003885$, the famed explorer $npcName:11003080$ may know something about what's going on, having himself recently survived the loss of his ship to unprecedented weather conditions.

quest.name: Secrets From the Deep
quest.desc:
It seems that the lapenshards may not be directly responsible for the ocean disturbances plaguing Maple World, but instead unidentified dark energies may be the culprits.
According to $npcName:11003885$, your best shot at uncovering the truth may lie in asking the famed explorer $npcName:11003080$ what he saw the day his ship was lost.

quest.name: The Great Explorer
quest.desc:
You arrived in $map:02000068$ and spoke with $npc:11000019$. Still recovering from his ordeal, it seems $npc:11003080$ requested not to be disturbed.
Considering the gravity of the situation, perhaps you can convince $npc:11000019$ to let you speak with $npc:11003080$ about what he saw.

quest.name: The Beast Below
quest.desc:
According to $npc:11003080$, he was shipwrecked by the guardian of the seas himself, $npc:11003086$. It seems the once peaceful divine beast is not the whale he used to be.
$npc:11003080$ said that the siren sisters $npc:11003888$ and $npc:11003889$ may be able to aid you in finding $npc:11003086$. The only problem is, he doesn't know where to find them.
Fortunately, he knows someone who does, a former pirate named $npc:11003082$. Travel to $map:02000182$ and speak with $npc:11003082$.

quest.name: Chorrie's Bad Day
quest.desc: After arriving in $map:02000182$, you located the $map:52000096$ where $npc:11003082$ lives. When you stepped inside, you found yourself in the middle of a messy situation.

quest.name: Dead Men Tell No Tales
quest.desc:
You rescued $npc:11003082$ from his angry former crewmen, but it seems he wants something more in exchange for the location of the siren sisters.
He wants you to erase any trace he was ever a pirate, so he can begin his life anew. It seems you have no other choice than to help him.

quest.name: In Search of Sirens
quest.desc:
$npc:11003082$ told you that the siren sisters live in the $map:52100002$ on $map:52100001$. However, reaching them may not be easy.
It appears the younger sister $npc:29000212$ has caught the attention of the pirate captain $npc:29000213$, who is dead-set on kidnapping the mer-lass.
Head to $map:52100001$ and ensure he does not succeed.

quest.name: A Seaside Chat
quest.desc: After defeating Captain $npc:29000213$ and clearing up a violent misunderstanding with the siren sisters, it is time you finally learned about $npc:11003086$ and his whereabouts.

quest.name: An Audience with Alvanos
quest.desc:
Rumor has it, something has driven $npc:11003086$ berserk, and his rampage has made oceans worldwide a danger to sail. You resolved to meet with $npc:11003086$ firsthand to resolve the situation.
Reaching $npc:11003086$ on such treacherous seas would be no easy feat, but according to $npc:11003082$, one vessel is up for the task! All you need to do is steal $npc:29000213$'s ship, $map:52100012$.
* You can enter $map:52100011$ through the portal on the dock in front of $map:52000096$ located in the south of $map:02000182$.
quest.manual: Subdue $npc:11003086$ <font color="#909090">* You can enter $map:52100011$ through the portal on the dock located in the south of $map:02000182$.</font>

quest.name: Guardian of the Seas
quest.desc:
After subduing $npc:11003086$, you learned about what set off his rampage in the first place.
It all started when $npc:11003795$ crashed into the ocean, the dark energies leeching from his body corrupting the lapenshards which had sprouted deep in the ocean.
Before the corruption might have destroyed his home, $npc:11003086$ summoned the power of the ocean to purge the seas of their corruption. However, in his weakened state, he himself became susceptible to the corrupting power of darkness...
You should hurry back to $map:52010068$ and report what you've learned.

quest.name: Between Crises
quest.desc: Your first assignment for the Frontier Foundation was a success, and Terrun Calibre was quite impressed. However your recent experiences raise many questions that must be answered...

quest.name: Shadow Seed
quest.desc: The raging seas have been quieted, but elsewhere, some of the Seven Commanders gather in the $map:52000185$ at $npc:11003894$'s behest. At the same time, $npc:11000057$ arrives to discuss a request from $npc:11003894$'s...

quest.name: Out in the Cold
quest.desc:
Considering what you learned during your undersea adventure, it seems likely the extreme weather in El Nath is tied to the lapenshard. Beatrice has tasked you with traveling there alongside $npcName:11003060$ to join up with the investigation that's already underway....
Surnuny's thinks the unnatural blizzard in the region was conjured by Erda, queen of a fallen kingdom in El Nath. He is quite concerned as to whether Queen Erda and the Frozen Crystal she watches after are both safe.

quest.name: A Frosty Encounter
quest.desc: Beatrice has tasked you with joining the ongoing investigation into the unusual weather in El Nath. Head to the $map:52000080$

quest.name: Resuming the Search
quest.desc: $npcName:11003949$ of Guidance was scouting the ice cave in $map:02000260$ when he encountered the forces of darkness. A $npcName:11003062$ appeared during the fight and left $npcName:11003949$ and his fellow expedition members injured. Head to the $map:52000081$ and look for clues.

quest.name: The Swordsman in the Snow
quest.desc:
Surrounded by monsters in the $map:52000081$, who should come to your aid but a $npcName:11003062$? Before vanishing into the blizzard, he cautioned you not to go any further if you value your life.
Return to the $map:52000080$ and catch $npc:11003949$ up on what happened.

quest.name: The Recluse Herbalist
quest.desc: $npcName:11003060$ knows of a potion that will allow you to resist the cold of the blizzard raging in $map:52000082$. Another yeti, $npcName:11003063$, knows how to make it. Find him at $map:02000263$.

quest.name: Burning Breath
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003063$ is not exactly happy with his former queen. With great difficulty, you managed to convince him to make you the potion.
Of course, now you have to gather the ingredients for him.

quest.name: A Chilling Development
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003063$ made you a bottle of $item:20000451$ that will let you pass through $map:52000082$. The potion's effects are temporary, so be sure to use it just before you enter! Once you enter the $map:52000083$, continue your investigation.
If you need another bottle of $item:20000451$, go to $npcName:11003063$ in $map:02000263$.
quest.manual: Drink the $item:20000451$ and investigate $map:52000083$ at the end of $map:52000082$

quest.name: Hand of the Queen
quest.desc: Long ago, $npcName:11003060$ was the palace gatekeeper for the kingdom of snow. $npcName:11003065$ needs his help to get to the $map:52000085$, where $npc:11003069$ is. Since $npcName:11003065$ is injured, deliver her message to $npcName:11003060$ and go to the $map:52000085$ in her place.

quest.name: Secrets in the Snow
quest.desc:
$npc:11003060$ says that $map:52000085$ guards the path to the $map:52000086$, where the snow kingdom's secret treasure was kept. He's worried that the specter who appeared to $npcName:11003069$ is connected to the darkness and is using her to get the treasure.
Enter the hidden cave door in $map:02000260$ to join $npcName:11003060$ at the $map:52000084$, then investigate the $map:52000085$.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000084$ through the hidden path in $map:02000260$ and investigate $map:52000085$
quest.complete: Return to $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$ and speak with $npc:11003060$

quest.name: To the Temple
quest.desc: $npc:11003069$ opened the path to the temple, but the vault to the Frozen Crystal is still locked. It seems likely that the forces of darkness are manipulating events here. Get ready to leave for the $map:52000086$ with $npcName:11003060$.

quest.name: Frost and Shadow
quest.desc: Meet $npcName:11003060$ at the $map:52000086$. You can get there through the passageway on the tallest, steepest part of $map:02000263$.

quest.name: Thawing the Ice
quest.desc: The cause of the extreme weather in El Nath was revealed with help from the snowfolk, and a world-ending ice age was averted. However, $npc:11004045$ seems forlorn after losing her beloved $npcName:11004024$ once more. Speak with $npcName:11004045$.

quest.name: Those Left Behind
quest.desc: Report to $npc:11004020$.

quest.name: After the Storm
quest.desc: Your investigation in El Nath has reached its conclusion. Report your findings to $npc:11003883$.

quest.name: Dragon Magic
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004032$'s analysis of the blackshard revealed it to be a lapenshard corrupted using powerful dragon magic. She believes it is possible to use the crystal to track the magic used to create it, but that she's the wrong person for the job.
There is someone who can help, but $npcName:11004032$ is reluctant to call for her aid...

quest.name: Eccentric Interests
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$, the master wizard, has concocted a spell that can track the lumarigon magic used to create the blackshard. Her expertise is vital in the mission at hand, but she's stubbornly refusing to do any field work.
Perhaps her mind can be changed?

quest.name: Where Ice Meets Fire
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ was persuaded into helping you. Meet her at $map:52000088$ to begin your search.

quest.name: Traces of Dragon Magic
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ senses lumarigon magic coming from the rune stones in $map:52000088$. Take a closer look at these stones.

quest.name: Bathed in Fire
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ is sure that the dragon you're tracking is in fact lumarigon—or at least related to the lumarigon in some way. Based on what you found, you should search for more evidence in $map:52000089$ at $map:02000268$.

quest.name: The Wounded Dragon
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ says you can learn a lot about a dragon from its scales. Examine the scales in $map:52000089$.

quest.name: Teleportation Tag-along
quest.desc:
The dragon scales in $map:52000089$ were tainted with dark magic. $npcName:11000042$'s tracking spell is now pointing her towards the Land of Darkness, but first she needs to visit the $map:02000146$ to get a more precise reading.
Speak with $npcName:11003089$ at the $map:02000146$.

quest.name: Oozing Darkness
quest.desc:
After arriving at $map:02000146$, $npcName:11000042$'s tracking spell picked up significant amounts of lumarigon magic in $map:52000090$. She needs you to hurry there, and gather samples of darkness from the area for her to analyze.
Defeat $npcNamePlural:29000164$ in $map:52000090$, which can be found at $map:03000043$ in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: Warped Space
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$ has pinpointed the last known location of the lumarigon spellcaster, which was surprisingly close.
Meet her at the $map:52000092$ beneath the $map:02000146$.

quest.name: De-Obfuscation
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$ discovered a large stretch of distorted space where it seems something is being hidden by magic. She is preparing a counterspell to remove the cloak, but she needs your help to gather reagents.
Gather $item:30000726$ in $map:52000093$.

quest.name: Essence of Darkness
quest.desc: To continue the plan to reveal whatever is hidden here, gather $item:30000727$ in $map:52000094$.

quest.name: Lifting the Veil
quest.desc: To complete the counterspell, place rune stones on the edges of the magic seal. You can get rune stones in the $map:52000092$.
quest.manual: Place rune stones on the magic seal in $map:52000092$

quest.name: Finally, Suddenly
quest.desc: The counterspell is ready! Overload the phase distortion with $npc:11000042$.

quest.name: 전초부대의 습격
quest.desc: 걷혀진 위상의 그늘, 그곳엔 다름 아닌 거대한 $npcName:11001698$의 성이 있었다. 설상가상으로 $npcName:11001698$의 군대마저 몰려들고 있는 상황. 이 군대가 지역을 벗어나 주변을 침공하기 전에 움직임을 최대한 막아내고 메이플 연합에 지원을 요청해야 한다! $npcName:11003089$$pp:와,과$ 함께 $npcName:11001698$의 전초부대를 있는 힘껏 막아보자.

quest.name: Turn Back the Dark
quest.desc:
With $npcName:11004033$'s aid, you discovered a fortress built by Madria hidden at the former site of the spatial distortion.
Together, you faced an endless horde of $npcName:11001698$'s minions. Luckily, $npcName:11004032$ had grown concerned during your absence and organized a rescue party who arrived just in time to assist you.
Alongside $npcName:11004052$ and $npcName:11004033$, you crushed Madria's forces.

quest.name: Lumiknights on the Scene
quest.desc: Thanks to $npcName:11004034$'s mass-teleportation spell, Captain Allon and his Lumiknights arrived just in time to help you take down the enemy army.

quest.name: The Rear Guard
quest.desc: $npcName:11003094$ and his Dark Wind agents are dominating the battlefield, thanks to their teleportation-enabled surprise attack.

quest.name: Cutting off the Escape
quest.desc: $npcName:11001585$ and her Green Hoods cut off the retreat of $npcName:11001698$'s army, sealing the alliance's victory.

quest.name: Revealed Stronghold
quest.desc:
After all this time, you finally stand before $npcName:11001698$'s stronghold. It was hidden in a pocket dimension outside the Shadow Gate this whole time!
With $npcName:11001698$'s forces routed, the Alliance plans to push its advantage and go on the offensive. Speak with $npcName:11003089$ about your next steps.

quest.name: The Siege of Madrakan
quest.desc: The Alliance's assault against $npcName:11001698$'s stronghold "Madrakan" is about to begin. The fortress is sure to crumble under the combined might of the Maple Alliance. Ride to the front line and prepare for the battle ahead.

quest.name: The Seal and the Spire
quest.desc:
The Alliance has finally started striking back at the forces of darkness. Madrakan is on the brink of falling, but one obstacle stands in the way.
A powerful seal surrounds the last holdout, $map:52100042$, Captain $npcName:11003679$ has tasked you with returning to the Frontier Foundation to speak with an expert about undoing the seal.

quest.name: The Girl's Past
quest.desc: After telling $npcName:11003883$ about the seal on $map:52100042$ and everything else that had happened, she told you about Madria's past.

quest.name: A Grudge from Long Ago
quest.desc: It seems that the seal's power source lies in a grudge from Madria's past.. $npcName:11004035$ and $npcName:11004034$ devise a plan to break the seal, but they need your help.

quest.name: Raze the Spire
quest.desc: After traveling to the $map:52100041$ and destroying the source of its power, the seal blocking entry to $map:52100042$ collapsed. Speak with $npcName:11003569$ in $map:02000402$ to determine your next steps.

quest.name: The Final Battle for Madrakan
quest.desc: It's time to conquer Madrakan once and for all. Travel to $map:52100042$ and deal a critical blow to the forces of darkness.
quest.manual: |Conquer $map:52100042$ <font color="#909090">(If you leave by mistake, talk to $npc:11003096$ in $map:52000091$ to return.)</font>

quest.name: Return to Ground Zero
quest.desc: After regaining consciousness several days after the dark crystal's explosion, you travel to the $map:52010068$ to speak with $npc:11003883$. $npc:11003883$ feels responsible for the disappearance of the leaders of Terrun Calibre, and wants to turbo-charge the search effort by mobilizing the full resources of the Frontier Foundation.

quest.name: Search and Rescue
quest.desc: $npcName:11004106$ summons you to the $map:02000496$ to investigate the site of the dark crystal's explosion and assist in the search effort for the missing Runeblades.

quest.name: The Giant Lapenshard
quest.desc: After traveling to help out the Foundation at the $map:02000496$, $npcName:11004108$ requested your help researching the anomaly at the center of the blast site.

quest.name: Through the Looking Glass
quest.desc: $npcName:11004108$ asked you to investigate the powerful anomaly surrounding the large lapenshard at the center of the crater. Upon arriving there you heard a familiar voice, before suddenly finding yourself inside the anomaly. While exploring your newfound surroundings, you encountered the missing Runeblades. However, they seemed different than you remembered...

quest.name: Critical Mass
quest.desc: You were flung out of the abyss from $map:02000496$ and reported to $npcName:11004106$ on what you experienced in ground zero. $npcName:11004106$ said their objective would not change even if the Runeblades have changed. You said you will enter the abyss of $map:02000496$ once more but $npcName:11004108$ blocked you.

quest.name: The Mysterious Bladesman Returns
quest.desc: After $npcName:11004108$'s warning that the new dark crystal that has formed in the $map:02000496$ is building towards an apocalyptic explosion, you resolve to re-enter the anomaly in the hopes of finding a solution. Once inside, you encounter an unexpected face...

quest.name: An Unlikely Partnership
quest.desc: You were surprised to encounter the $npcName:11004112$ within the anomaly. Arguing that your goals were aligned, he convinced you that the two of you should work together to rescue the missing Runeblades.

quest.name: Emerald Dreams
quest.desc:
Using the power of rune magic, the $npcName:11004112$ managed to track down the missing Runeblades. It turns out they're right here—albeit in a parallel region of spacetime. Using his powers and the unique properties of his blade, the $npcName:11004112$ carved a rift leading to the first of four such pocket dimensions where he believed the Runeblades dwelled. Enter the rift and rescue the lost Runeblades!
This solo dungeon can only be entered when you have the related quest. Either click the [Enter Alone] button or go through the entrance created in $map:52010069$.

quest.name: Corrupted Runeblades
quest.desc: After battling with a twisted version of $npcName:11004130$ within the pocket dimension, you told the $npcName:11004112$ everything that happened. The $npcName:11004112$ believes that $npcName:11004130$'s true self has been suppressed by the dark crystal, and that the only way to save the Runeblades is by dispersing the energy within the dark crystal.

quest.name: Altered Space
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004112$ opened a rift to the next dimensional pocket and urged you to step inside. Your mission is clear.
This solo dungeon can only be entered when you have the related quest. Either click the [Enter Alone] button or go through the entrance created in $map:52010069$.

quest.name: The Rune's Toll
quest.desc: After confronting $npcName:11004129$ in his altered state, you emerged from the pocket dimension to find the $npcName:11004112$ looking exhausted. Nevertheless, he carved open a rift to the next realm and urged you to investigate.

quest.name: Twisted Time
quest.desc:
The repeated opening of dimensional rifts seems to have taken a serious toll on the $npcName:11004112$'s body, yet he urges you to keep going. After demanding you promise to find a way to save the missing Runeblades, he reluctantly agrees to seek treatment—but not before opening a rift to $npcName:11004128$'s domain.
This solo dungeon can only be entered when you have the related quest. Either click the [Enter Alone] button or go through the entrance created in $map:52010069$.

quest.name: Save Terrun Calibre, Save the World
quest.desc: You defeated $npc:11004128$ in his corrupted state, and he fled, just like the others. After returning from your expedition, you find $npcName:11004112$ at the Foundation base camp. He has some ideas about how to save the leaders of Terrun Calibre and prevent the end of the world, but he says you'll need help to do it. Thankfully, $npcName:11004108$ is uniquely qualified in the subject of lapenshards.

quest.name: All In
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004108$ says that the only way to stop the new dark crystal from exploding is to extract the corrupted Runeblades from the anomaly. She also said that fighting them will burn off the power accumulated by the crystal, restoring the Runeblades to their former selves, and eliminating the threat posed by the blackshard. For the sake of your friends, and all of Maple World, it's time to enter the $map:02020130$.
This solo dungeon can only be entered when you have the related quest. Either click the [Enter Alone] button or go through the entrance created in $map:02000496$.

quest.name: The Runeblades Return
quest.desc: The leaders of Terrun Calibre have been rescued, and you survived the ordeal relatively unscathed—yet the Runeblades have failed to awaken despite their apparent healthy state. The $npcName:11004112$ hypothesized that residual blackshard energy within their bodies was preventing them from awakening. Thankfully, $npcName:11004108$ has devised a plan to help them.

quest.name: A Venomous Truth
quest.desc:
With the Runeblades' awakening came a joyful reunion which proved short-lived when the $npcName:11004112$ was identified as $npcName:11004115$, an alleged traitor to Terrun Calibre. But according to $npcName:11004115$, it was not he who was the traitor, but their former master Arazaad. $npcName:11004115$ says that Master Arazaad intended to hand Terrun Calibre over to the $npcName:11003894$ in the interest of self-preservation in the sight of the approaching tide of darkness.
$npcName:11004115$ claims that when he tried to convince Arazaad of the error of his ways, his master attacked him, and he was forced to end Arazaad's life. While you are having a difficult time swallowing such an outlandish tale, Ishura doesn't seem so certain...

quest.name: An End to the Blackshard Threat
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004128$ is reluctant to accept the visions of the future he witnessed within the anomaly—but he is not quite ready to dismiss them either. In the end, he decided to let $npcName:11004115$ leave of his own volition.
The future may be uncertain, but one thing is not: thanks to your actions, the leaders of Terrun Calibre are safe, and the threat of the blackshards seems to be ended. You return to the Frontier Foundation to celebrate a job well done, and officially conclude your investigation into the lapenshard crises.
With catastrophe averted, Terrun Calibre and Guidance, and the visiting alliance leaders all make their way home to their respective bases of operation. For now, Maple World is a calmer place. And as for you, it seems the best course of action is to ensure that whenever the next dark threat rears its ugly head, you're ready for it.

quest.name: Convening the World Security Council
quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11004390$ has called you to an emergency meeting. Go to $map:52020037$ and discover what's happened.

quest.name: An Uncharted Continent
quest.desc: An unidentified continent has appeared in the skies of Maple World from parts unknown. According to Captain $npcName:11004312$, Sky Fortress's instruments detected the presence of lapenshards. $npcName:11004316$ believes they may have arrived there as a result of the dark crystal's latest detonation. $npcName:11004312$ suggested Sky Fortress investigate the mysterious new land immediately, and the Empress gave her approval.

quest.name: First Contact
quest.desc: You arrived in $map:02020029$ by way of one of Sky Fortress's dropships, where you detected a nearby lifeform. If it is intelligent, it might provide you with some useful information.
quest.complete: Ask $npcName:11004387$ for information about this new land

quest.name: Survival of the Fittest
quest.desc:
While investigating $map:02020029$, you encountered an individual named $npcName:11004387$—the alliance's first contact with a denizen of this strange new continent. $npcName:11004387$ agrees to tell you what he knows about the missile fired against Sky Fortress in exchange for your aid. He wants you to harvest a substance called "aetherine" from the nearby fauna to power his rifle.
Time to go hunting.

quest.name: Mysterious Assailants
quest.desc: As thanks for your help, $npcName:11004387$ told you that the missile targeting Sky Fortress was fired from a base in the north operated by an unknown and hostile force he believes originated in Maple World. The unidentified foe landed on the unidentified continent several days ago and have been terrorizing the "Kidel" region in search of something. You decide to travel into enemy territory to track down the missile's launch site.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020001$ on the hill to the north.

quest.name: The Woman in the Rubble
quest.desc: You discover an unidentified woman in the rubble of the Dark Army's camp to the north of $map:02020029$. She appears to be disoriented and hungry. You decide to harvest fruit from the nearby trees for her.

quest.name: The Enemy of Your Enemy
quest.desc: After learning that the Daemon Army's airship landed somewhere in the outskirts of $map:02020029$, you returned to the forest in search of clues.
quest.complete: Explore the east end of the $map:02020029$

quest.name: A New Assignment
quest.desc: $npcName:11004393$ said that the rest of his squad was captured by the Dark Army. After pursuing them to their camp, he witnessed a terrible scene and had no choice but to flee.

quest.name: The Kindness of Strangers
quest.desc: $npcName:11004393$ says he needs the medicinal herbs which grow in aetherine-infused soil nearby to get his comrades well enough to travel. You decide to help him.

quest.name: Onward to Richmonde
quest.desc: $npcName:11004393$ told you about the history of Humanitas and their conflict with Tairen. On the subject of your own investigation into the Dark Army's search for an unknown woman, he suggested you visit Humanitas's headquarters in $map:02020030$ and ask around.
quest.manual: Travel to the Humanitas base in $map:02020030$

quest.name: A Bloody Gesture
quest.desc: $map:02020030$ finds itself under siege by soldiers of the Dark Army—or the Daemon Army, as they are known by Kritians. Hoping to endear yourself to Humanitas's leader, you decide to follow $npcName:11004388$'s advice and engage the Daemon Army soldiers.

quest.name: New Acquaintances
quest.desc:
You met with $npcName:11004395$, leader of Humanitas, and learned that Kritias's arrival in Maple World was as much a surprise to its denizens as to you.
With the arrival of the Daemon Army in Kritias, Humanitas—who were already under regular siege from Tairen—are now waging a war on two fronts. Despite having a shared foe, $npcName:11004395$ had no interest in working together, as she blamed the Maple Alliance for the Daemon Army's invasion of Kritias. She then issued an ultimatum: Sky Fortress must withdraw from Kritias within ten days, or be fired upon.
The woman you met at the missile site advocated on your behalf to little success. When you asked $npcName:11004395$ what the woman was doing in here office, she kicked you out. If $npcName:11004395$ isn't willing to listen to reason, perhaps her adjutant will be?

quest.name: Behind Enemy Lines
quest.desc:
You spoke with $npc:11004395$'s adjutant $npcName:11004396$, who thanked you for helping his brother and apologized for his superiors curtness.
$npcName:11004396$ revealed that Humanitas were once citizens of Tairen who revolted against the AI who governed them when she began exiling people to bring her "utopia" to fruition.
During his explanation, $npcName:11004396$ receives an urgent call for reinforcements. It seems that Daemon Army soldiers are on the verge of overrunning the guard post in the west. Luckily for them, you have volunteered to aid them.

quest.name: Proof of Death
quest.desc:
$npc:11004397$ thanks you for coming to his aid. He tells you that one of his soldiers was separated from the group during the fighting, and requests that you search for him.
Find the missing soldier. If he is alive, escort him back to $map:02020030$ for medical attention. If he is dead, collect his identification tag and deliver it to $npcName:11004395$.

quest.name: The Child of Vanheim
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004395$ revealed that the identification tag belonged to the first exile she had rescued after founding Humanitas. In light of your actions to aid Humanitas, she seems more receptive to discussion.
Through your dialogue, you both come to realize the exile standing before you is $npcName:11004400$, the daughter of Maple World's sage $npcName:11004431[gender:0]$ and the individual responsible for sealing Kritias away so many years ago.
It was then that $npcName:11004430$ and his minions arrived.

quest.name: Transmission Troubles
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004400$, the woman whose power sealed Kritias away, has been captured by $npcName:11004430$. If the forces of darkness were to use her power for evil, the results would be devastating.
Thankfully, it seems Humanitas placed a tracker on $npcName:11004400$ as a precautionary measure. There's one small catch however—$map:02020030$'s signal repeater was damaged by the Daemon Army's recent attacks. In order to repair it and locate $npcName:11004400$, you'll have to harvest the necessary part from one of the mechanical soldiers on the floating islands nearby.

quest.name: Can't Stop the Signal
quest.desc:
Using the technical manual $npcName:11004396$ gave you and the part you harvested, you managed to repair $map:02020030$'s signal repeater.
$npcName:11004395$'s tracking device should be online now. Go find out.

quest.name: A Desperate Search
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004395$'s tracking device placed $npcName:11004400$ within the vicinity of $map:02020031$, a Tairen resource extraction operation.
$npcName:11004395$ suggested you speak with the Humanitas agent on site in the hopes they saw where $npcName:11004400$ was taken.

quest.name: Forging a Path
quest.desc:
You arrived at the Tairen resource extracting operation in $map:02020031$, and spoke with $npcName:11004398$, a Humanitas agent. $npcName:11004398$ recounted what he witnessed, including $npcName:11004430$'s takeover of $map:02020031$ wherein he somehow took control of the numerous mechanized soldiers nearby.
If you want to break into the fusion reactor where $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$ is allegedly being held, you're going to have to carve a path through enemy lines.

quest.name: These Blasted Doors
quest.desc:
According to $npcName:11004399$, the room where $npcName:11004400$ is being held has been sealed off by the facility's blast doors, which do not seem to budge.
Try to break through the blast door inside the $map:52100105$.
quest.manual: Attempt to open the blast door

quest.name: Extreme Measures
quest.desc:
With time short and entry into the reactor blocked, $npcName:11004395$ suggests a variety of well-meaning but dangerous ideas to break inside. Formulating a plan based on the intel you received from a Humanitas agent, you call Sky Fortress to request they fire on the spire that feeds aetherine into the reactor facility.
If what you've been told is true, destroying the spire will cause all of the reactor's blast doors to open. After much persuading, $npcName:11004312$ agreed to your plan. You travel back to the $map:52100104$ in the hopes the operation was a success.

quest.name: The Daring Rescue
quest.desc:
You arrived at the $map:52100105$ and spoke with the Humanitas agent on site. It seems the plan was a success: the spire is destroyed, and the blast door is open.
Now comes the moment of truth. Enter the $map:52100105$ and rescue $npcName:11004400[gender:1]$.

quest.name: The Power Within
quest.desc: In an unexpected turn of events, $npcName:11004400$ utilized $npcName:11004430$'s plan to extract the Blue Lapenta from her body to instead awaken its power inside her. Summoning the lapenta's power, she attacked $npcName:11004430$, who had no other choice but to retreat from the $map:52100105$.

quest.name: A Link Between Worlds
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004430$ may have retreated for now, but he'll be back with another plan to capture $npcName:11004400$ and steal her power. $npcName:11004400$ however seems unconcerned about this, and has left on a mission of her own.
You should travel to $map:02020041$ and formulate a new course of action.

quest.name: 지식의 보고
quest.desc: $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 $map:2000001$ 왕실의 조력을 얻으려고 하셨으나 $npc:11000075$$pp:는,은$ 고사하고 고위 관계자 한 명 만날 수 없었다고 한다. $npc:11001231$$pp:가,이$ 찾으려는 것은 바즈의 지혜라 불리는 선조들의 유산. $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 바즈의 지혜를 찾다보면 $npc:11001231$와 언젠가 만날 수 있을 것이라 하신다. 오랜 역사를 자랑하는 $map:2000031$에서라면 바즈의 지혜에 대한 정보를 얻을 수 있지 않을까? $map:2000031$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000005$$pp:를,을$ 만나보는 것이 좋겠다.
quest.complete: $map:2000031$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 바즈의 지혜에 관한 정보 얻기

quest.name: 유물 복원의 전문가
quest.desc: $npc:11000005$의 말에 따르면 옛 문헌에서 바즈의 지혜와 유사한 내용을 찾을 수 있었지만, 그것이 바즈의 지혜인지 어떤지는 확언할 수 없다고 한다. 설상가상으로 문헌의 대부분은 훼손되어있는 상태. $npc:11000005$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11001261$에게 맡긴다면 문헌을 복원할 수 있다고 한다. $npc:11001261$는 특별한 재료를 찾기위해 $map:2000014$에 위치한 $map:52000019$$pp2:로,으로$ 향했다고 한다. $npc:11001261$$pp:를,을$ 만나 문헌의 복원을 부탁하는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 튀어나와요, 꿈틀이의 구덩이
quest.desc: $map:52000019$에 서식지에서만 구할 수 있는 특별한 재료를 채취하고 있는 $npc:11001261$$pp:는,은$ 자신의 작업을 옆에서 보조해달라고 한다. $map:52000019$ 곳곳에는 $npc:29000068$들이 서식하고 있으니 $npc:11001261$$pp:가,이$ 무사히 재료 채취 작업을 마칠 수 있게 돕도록 하자.
quest.manual: $npc:11001277$의 작업이 무사히 끝날 때까지 곁에서 돕기

quest.name: 215호실의 손님
quest.desc: 여관 주인 $npc:11000390$이 알려준 대로라면 $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 $map:52000018$에 투숙하고 계신다고 한다. 어서 $npc:11001246$ 스승님을 만나보도록 하는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 도움의 보답
quest.desc: $npc:11001261$$pp:는,은$ 자신의 작업을 도운 보답으로 문헌의 복원을 약속하였다. 비록 시간이 오래 걸린다고는 하였지만 어쨌거나 바즈의 지혜에 대한 첫 실마리를 얻었다. $map:52000018$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 $npc:11001246$ 스승님에게 이 사실을 알리는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 바로타 상단의 두 번째 거래 품목
quest.desc: $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 바즈의 지혜, 홀슈타트에 대한 정보 수집을 위해 빅토리아 아일랜드 최대 규모의 보부상 조직인 바로타 상단의 협력을 구하는 것이 좋겠다고 하신다. 스승님의 말처럼 우선 $map:2000033$에 있는 $npc:11000484$와 만나 바로타 상단에 대해 물어보는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 정보 의뢰
quest.desc: $npc:11000484$는 $map:2000139$에 위치한 $map:52000020$에서 양질의 정보를 관리하며 원하는 고객에게 제공한다고 한다. $map:52000020$의 $npc:11001262$를 찾아가면 무엇이든 원하는 정보를 제공해줄 것이라고 하니 우선 $npc:11001262$를 만나보는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 의문의 기습
quest.desc: $npc:11001262$$pp:와,과$ 이야기를 나누던 와중에 그가 입구 부근에서 심상치 않은 소리를 들은 것 같다고 한다. $npc:11001262$의 말에 따르면 최근 들어 바로타 상단의 일을 방해하는 자들이 나타났는데 혹시 그들이 아닌지 걱정하고 있다. $map:52000020$의 입구 부근을 조사하여 그의 걱정을 해소시켜 주는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 상단을 노리는 배후
quest.desc: $npc:11001262$$pp:는,은$ 이번 일의 배후가 줄곧 바로타 상단의 일을 방해하는 세력에 의한 것이라고 한다. $npcName:11001262$의 눈치를 보아 짐작하고 있는 자들이 있는 것 같지만…어쩐지 입을 다물어버렸다. 어쨌거나 $npcName:11001262$에게서 협조를 약속받았으니 일단은 $map:52000018$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 $npc:11001246$ 스승님에게 상황을 보고드리는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 변절자를 쫓아서
quest.desc: $npc:11001262$$pp:가,이$ 보내온 정보에 따르면 $map:2000082$에서 $map:52000021$를 발견했다고 한다. $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 신속하게 움직여야 한다며 $map:52000021$에서 만나자고 한다. 빅토리아 아일랜드에 도착하고 나서 처음으로 찾은 $npc:11001231$의 흔적이다. 어서 $map:52000021$로 가는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 감옥에서 일어난 일
quest.desc: $npc:11001264$$pp:는,은$ 빅토리아 아일랜드 남부의 $map:2000062$부터 $npc:11001231$의 행방을 쫓았는데 $npc:11001231$$pp:와,과$ 인상착의가 유사한 남자가 $map:2000124$$pp2:로,으로$ 향했다는 정보를 입수했다고 말한다. 하지만 $npc:11001231$의 행방을 쫓다보니 미처 확인하지 못한 것이 마음에 걸린다고 한다. $npc:11001264$$pp:가,이$ 말한 소문의 진위 파악을 위해 $map:2000124$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npcTitle:11000514$$pp:를,을$ 만나보든 죄수와 이야기를 하든 조사해보는 것이 좋겠다. $map:2000124$$pp:는,은$ $map:2000062$에서 $npc:11000585$$pp:를,을$ 통해 배를 타고 갈 수 있다고 한다.
quest.manual: $map:2000124$에서 $npcTitle:11000514$ 만나보기|$map:2000124$의 죄수들과 만나 정보 얻기|$map:2000124$의 죄수들과 만나 정보 얻기|$map:2000124$의 죄수들과 만나 정보 얻기

quest.name: 알 수 없는 행보
quest.desc: $npc:11000649$$pp:가,이$ 한 말을 종합해보면 $npc:11001231$$pp2:로,으로$ 의심되는 자의 주도하에 $map:2000146$에서 모종의 계획이 시행되고 있는 것 같다. $npc:11000649$$pp:가,이$ 언급한 자가 정말 $npc:11001231$$pp:가,이$ 맞을까? 어느 것 하나 확신할 수는 없다. 일단 $npc:11001246$ 스승님에게 이 사실을 알리는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 복원된 문헌
quest.desc: $npc:11000005$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11001261$에게 의뢰했던 문헌의 복원이 마무리되었다고 한다. 하지만 예기치 않았던 문제가 생겼으니 문헌의 기록된 내용들이 모두 의미를 파악하기 어려운 아리송한 시구로 되어있다. 우선 $npc:11001246$ 스승님에게 가서 이 사실을 알려드려야겠다.

quest.name: 변절자의 흔적
quest.desc: $npc:11001262$$pp:는,은$ $map:3000014$에 위치한 $map:52000022$에서 $npc:11001231$의 행적이 발견되었다는 소식을 알려왔다. 다만 $npc:11001231$$pp:는,은$ 이미 거처를 옮긴 것으로 확인되었다고 한다. $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 $map:2000124$에서 얻은 정보도 그렇고 여러가지로 $npc:11001231$의 행보가 의문투성이라며 직접 조사하겠다고 하셨다. 어둠의 땅인 $map:3000014$에 위치한 $map:52000022$에서 만나자고 하셨으니 어서 서둘러야할 것 같다. $map:2000146$에 어둠의 땅으로 통하는 문이 있다고 하니 그곳을 경유한다면 $map:3000014$$pp2:로,으로$ 갈 수 있을 것 같다.

quest.name: 새로운 임무
quest.desc: $npc:11001268$$pp:는,은$ $map:52000021$에서의 일로 아직 $npc:11001265$$pp:가,이$ 온전히 활동하기에는 무리라고 한다. $npc:11001246$ 스승님의 당부대로 $map:2000076$에 위치한 $map:2000361$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11001265$$pp:를,을$ 만나는 것이 우선일 것 같다.

quest.name: 첫 번째 바즈의 유적을 찾아서
quest.desc: $npc:11001265$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000442$에 기록된 첫 번째 시구의 해석을 마무리 했다고 한다. $npc:11001265$의 해석에 따르면 $map:2000058$에 옛 선조들이 남긴 지식이 잠든 $map:2000363$$pp:가,이$ 있을 것이라고 한다. 어서 $map:2000058$에 위치해있다는 $map:2000363$$pp:를,을$ 찾도록 하자.

quest.name: 두 번째 바즈의 유적을 찾아서
quest.desc: $npc:11001265$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000442$에 기록된 두 번째 시구의 해석을 마무리 했다고 한다. $npc:11001265$의 해석에 따르면 $map:2000090$에 옛 선조들이 남긴 지식이 잠든 $map:2000364$$pp:가,이$ 있을 것이라고 한다. 어서 $map:2000090$에 위치해있다는 $map:2000364$$pp:를,을$ 찾도록 하자.

quest.name: 세 번째 바즈의 유적을 찾아서
quest.desc: $npc:11001265$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000442$에 기록된 두 번째 시구의 해석을 마무리 했다고 한다. $npc:11001265$의 해석에 따르면 $map:2000067$에 옛 선조들이 남긴 지식이 잠든 $map:2000366$$pp:가,이$ 있을 것이라고 한다. 어서 $map:2000067$에 위치해있다는 $map:2000366$$pp:를,을$ 찾도록 하자.

quest.name: 스승이 전한 소식
quest.desc: $npc:11001265$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11001231$의 행방을 쫓아 어둠의 땅으로 떠나신 $npc:11001246$ 스승님으로부터 서신을 받았다고 한다. 그간 연락이 닿지 않았던 $npc:11001246$ 스승님으로부터의 소식이다. 어서 무슨 말씀을 하셨는지 확인하는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 수행자의 의무
quest.desc: $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 강해지기 위한 수련은 자신의 신체만 단련하는 것이 능사가 아니라고 하셨다. 과거 칼리브 아일랜드에서의 수행 이후 오랜만에 $npc:11001246$ 스승님에게 받는 지도다. 어서 무슨 가르침을 주실지 경청하는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 배움의 길
quest.desc: $npc:11001246$ 스승님은 지난 번에 알려준 가르침을 게을리 하고 있는지 확인하셨다. $npc:11001246$ 스승님이 실망하시지 않도록 어서 $npc:11001246$ 스승님의 가르침을 경청하도록 하는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: 괴상한 소문의 질병
quest.desc: $npc:11001443$$pp:는,은$ 최근 마을에 발생한 괴상한 질병 환자들을 한데 모아 $map:02010005$에 격리해놓았다고 한다. $npcName:11001443$의 진단으론 특별히 전염성이 의심되진 않지만 일반적인 질병이라고 보기에는 마치 마법이나 주술에서나 느낄법한 위화감이 느껴진다고 한다. 그런탓인지 그들의 병을 저주가 내렸다고 비방하는 일부 마을 사람들이 $map:02010005$에 공공연히 험한 짓을 하고 있다고… $map:02010005$에 가서 환자들의 상태를 보고 도울만한 일이 있는지 알아보도록 하자.

quest.name: 소녀들의 약속
quest.desc: $npcName:11001392$$pp:는,은$ 마을 사람들이 $map:02010005$에 있는 이들을 모두 저주에 걸렸다고 손가락질해서 두려웠다고 한다. 그런탓에 환자들과 마주치는 것을 다들 꺼려했는데 $npcName:11001396$만큼은 달랐다고 한다. $npcTitle:11001396$$pp:라고,이라고$ 불리는 비상한 머리의 소유자, $npcName:11001396$$pp:가,이$ 병을 치료할 방법을 찾겠다고 자신과 새끼 손가락 걸고 약속했다고 한다. 하지만 며칠이 지나도 소식이 없어서 혹시라도 $npcName:11001396$마저 자신들을 버린 것이 아닐까 걱정하고 있는데… $npcName:11001392$의 말에 따르면 $npcName:11001396$의 부모인 $npc:11001390$$pp:가,이$ $map:02010063$에 있다고 하니 그에게 $npcName:11001396$의 소식을 듣도록 하자.

quest.name: 나빌라를 찾아서
quest.desc: $npcName:11001390$$pp:는,은$ $npcName:11001396$$pp:가,이$ $map:02010023$$pp2:로,으로$ 떠났다고 한다. 그동안 $npcName:11001396$$pp:가,이$ 유적지 관찰이나 연구를 좋아하는 취미 차원에서 집을 비운 것으로 생각하고 있던 $npcName:11001390$$pp:는,은$ 자신의 딸과 $npcName:11001392$의 약속 이야기를 을 듣고 꽤나 놀라는 눈치다. 말썽을 일으키진 않으나 워낙에 제멋대로인 성격탓에 늘 조마조마하다는 $npcName:11001390$$pp:는,은$ 마을의 의사인 $npcName:11001443$도 치료하지 못하는 병을 해결하겠다고 나선 딸이 걱정된다고 한다. 게다가 하나 뿐인 딸이 밥이나 굶고 다니는 것은 아닌지… 자나깨나 딸을 걱정하는 $npcName:11001390$의 마음이 담긴 도시락을 $npcName:11001396$에게 전해주도록 하자.

quest.name: 유적에서 발견한 실마리
quest.desc: $npcName:11001396$$pp:는,은$ $map:02010023$에 펼쳐진 거대한 유적지를 꾸준히 관찰해온 결과, 유적지 주변에서 출몰하는 $npc:21000674$$pp:가,이$ 수상한 석판 조각을 들고 있는 것을 보았다고 한다. 어쩌면 마을에 창궐한 괴이한 질병의 원인이 그들의 짓일지 의심도 들고…그 석판 조각을 얻을 수 있다면 그 내막은 물론, 자신의 가설도 정리해볼 수 있을 것 같다고 한다. $map:02010023$에 출몰한 $npc:21000674$에게서 의문의 석판 조각을 구하도록 하자.

quest.name: 실마리는 기적을 낳고
quest.desc: $npcName:11001396$$pp:는,은$ 석판의 내용을 $npcName:11001397$$pp:라는,이라는$ 모로파파 부족원에게 부탁해야겠다고 한다. $npcName:11001396$의 말에 따르면 $npcName:11001397$에게 이미 $npcName:11001392$$pp:와의,과의$ 약속을 이야기했고, $npcName:11001397$ 역시 $npcName:11001392$$pp:가,이$ 앓고있는 질병에 대해서 본인만의 연구를 진행하겠다는 말을 들었다고 한다. $map:02010023$ 근방 어딘가에 있다는 $npcName:11001397$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 석판의 해석을 부탁하도록 하자.
quest.manual: $npcName:11001396$에게서 석판 조각 받기|$npcName:11001397$$pp:를,을$ 만나 석판 조각의 해석 부탁하기

quest.name: 기적 좋은 날
quest.desc: $npcName:11001396$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000504$$pp2:로,으로$ 분명 $npcName:11001392$$pp:와의,과의$ 약속을 지킬 수 있다며 기뻐한다. $npcName:11001396$$pp:는,은$ 유적에 대한 기록을 정리할 시간이 필요하니 어서 $npcName:11001392$에게 이 기쁜 소식과 비약을 전해달라고 한다. 서둘러 $map:02010063$에 위치한 $map:02010005$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 $npcName:11001392$에게 $item:30000504$$pp:를,을$ 전해주도록 하자.

quest.name: 산산조각난 약속
quest.desc: $npcName:11001392$의 오빠인 $npcName:11001391$$pp:는,은$ 역시 사람들이 하는 약속은 다 거짓말이라고 한다. 자신들의 부모도 도망쳐버렸고, 마을 사람들은 저주받았다고 손가락질 하였고, 결국 동생이 믿던 사람마저 약속을 저버린 것에 크게 분노하였다. 안타깝지만 $npcName:11001396$에게 이 사실을 전해줘야할 것 같다.

quest.name: 끝없는 연습
quest.desc:
$map:02000001$의 $npc:11001320$$pp:는,은$ 연습을 게을리하면 좋은 음악가가 될 수 없다며, 꾸준히 연습을 하라고 조언한다. 연주에 필요한 악기나 악보가 없다면 $npc:11001320$의 상점에서 구입할 수 있다. (부디 $npc:11001320$의 장삿속이 아니기를….)
25레벨 연주 가이드 [연주 가이드 : 입문] 챕터 퀘스트를 수행하면 연주에 필요한 악기와 악보를 무료로 얻을 수 있습니다.

quest.name: 재능기부
quest.desc: $map:02000001$의 $npc:11001320$$pp:는,은$ 연주 실력이 뛰어나다고 칭찬하며 보다 많은 사람들 앞에서 아름다운 연주를 들려주라고 말한다.

quest.name: 실리를 추구하며
quest.desc: $map:02000002$의 $npc:11000781$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000002$ 낚시터 뒤쪽에 있는 광맥에서 $item:33000001$$pp:를,을$ 캐는 것을 도와달라고 말한다.

quest.name: 음악을 낚다
quest.desc: $npc:11000781$$pp:는,은$ 아름다운 선율을 따라 물고기들이 모여들 정도로 훌륭한 연주를 부탁한다.

quest.name: 춤추는 물고기
quest.desc:
$npc:11000781$$pp:는,은$ 아름다운 선율에 물고기들이 더 많이 모여드는 것 같다며, 잠시 낚싯대를 드리우고 여유를 즐겨보라고 말한다.
20레벨 낚시 가이드 [낚시 가이드 : 입문] 챕터 퀘스트를 수행하면 낚시에 필요한 낚싯대를 무료로 획득할 수 있습니다.

quest.name: 휴식의 끝자리
quest.desc: $map:02000002$의 $npc:11000781$$pp:는,은$ 종종 들러서 연주도 들려주고 낚시도 하다가 가라고 말한다.

quest.name: 우렁찬 외침
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ 가득 분노에 찬 $npcTitle:11000003$의 외침이 퍼져온다. 무슨 일일까?

quest.name: 새로운 미끼
quest.desc:
$map:02000001$의 $npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 집에서 키우는 닭이 떨어트린 $item:33000026$$pp:가,이$ 필요하다고 말한다.
내 집으로 돌아가 닭을 분양받고 $item:33000026$ 수확을 시도해보자.
quest.manual: 내 집에서 키우는 닭의 $item:33000026$ 수확 시도하기

quest.name: 미끼를 물다
quest.desc:
$npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 원래 쓰던 미끼를 던져주며 내게 $map:02000001$에서 물고기를 낚으면 본인이 호랑이가 아니라 고양이라며 도발한다. $map:02000001$에서 제대로 낚시 실력을 발휘해보자.
낚시 숙련도가 부족해서 $map:02000001$에서 낚시하기 어렵다면, 근처 $map:02000002$에서 낚시를 하며 숙련도를 올려보자.
어흥이의 시크릿 노하우 : "32레벨 낚시 가이드 [낚시 가이드 : 심화] 챕터 퀘스트를 수행하면 낚시 숙련 레벨을 빠르게 초보 2단계로 올릴 수 있다구!"

quest.name: 불평어린 우정
quest.desc: 자존심 강한 $npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 내기에 진 것을 소문내지 않겠다는 말에 화를 누그러뜨리며 선물로 준 $item:50200010$$pp:를,을$ 집에 설치해보라고 권한다. 그다지 내 집에 어울리지 않을 것 같더라도 다혈질 $npcTitle:11000003$$pp:가,이$ 또 흥분해서 고래고래 소리 지르는 모습을 보는 것보다 설치 한번 해주고 마음을 달래주는 편이 나을 것 같다.

quest.name: 축제를 열다
quest.desc: $map:02000001$의 $npc:11000059$$pp:는,은$ 얼마 후 $map:02000064$에서 축제가 열릴 거라며 기대에 찬 목소리로 소식을 전한다.

quest.name: 땀방울의 가치
quest.desc:
$map:02000064$의 $npc:11000711$$pp:는,은$ 축제 공연 무대 제작에 필요한 재료 모으는 일을 부탁해왔다.
채광 숙련도가 부족하다면 $map:02000002$에서 $item:33000001$$pp:를,을$ 채광하면서 숙련도를 충분히 올리도록 하자.

quest.name: 민트, 너라면…
quest.desc:
$map:02000064$의 $npc:11000711$$pp:는,은$ 바니바니 공연단을 위해서 $item:33000064$$pp:를,을$ 만들어 줄 수 있는지 물어본다.
오른쪽 하단 [생활] 메뉴에서 [생활 기술 > 제작 > 대장] 창을 열어서 제작을 시도해보자. 제작 숙련도가 부족하다면, 현재 숙련도로 제작 가능한 물품들을 꾸준히 제작하면서 숙련도를 충분히 올리도록 하자.

quest.name: 내 마음의 멜로디
quest.desc: $item:33000064$ 제작에 대한 감사의 표시로 $npc:11000711$$pp:는,은$ 바니바니 공연단원들이 연습용으로 사용하는 악기를 며칠동안 빌려줄 테니 사용해보라고 말한다.

quest.name: 나도 밴드다
quest.desc: $map:02000064$의 $npc:11000711$$pp:는,은$ 음악은 사람과 사람의 마음을 이어주는 좋은 매개체가 될 거라고 말하며 친구들과 함께 모여서 연주를 해보라고 한다.
quest.manual: 두 명 이상 모여서 함께 합주해보기

quest.name: The Caravan
quest.desc: You met a guardsman, $npcName:11003180$, in $map:02000062$. He says you should go into the $map:52000116$ to sign up as a caravan guard.

quest.name: A Natural Hero
quest.desc: You're all signed up to escort the caravan to Tria! According to $npcName:11003163$, they're waiting on one last guard. Who could it be?

quest.name: A Simple Job
quest.desc: $npcName:11003164$ is probably the weakest guard you've ever met. This is supposed to be an easy job, but the fact that your partner on the caravan escort isn't strong enough to defeat a small puppy doesn't fill you with confidence...
quest.manual: Escort the caravan through the $map:63000041$, northwest of $map:02000062$|Make your report at $map:02000001$

quest.name: An Imperial Audience
quest.desc: After the disastrous caravan attack, you woke up in Tria with $npc:11003165$ watching over you. He's asked you to come to the $map:52000033$. Her Imperial Highness wants to see you.

quest.name: The Investigation
quest.desc: At $npc:11003165$'s request, you are investigating the attack on the caravan. Begin by seeking the advice of $npc:11003163$, who had intimate knowledge of the caravan schedule and route.

quest.name: The Masked Figure
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003166$ encountered a $npcName:11003167$ at $map:52000118$. Instead of taking the suspicious character in for questioning, he let them go. Now you have no suspects and no leads.
Little matter! Take $npcName:11003166$'s special brand of incompetence in stride and follow the $npcName:11003167$, who seems to be headed for $map:02000092$!

quest.name: Chasing the Mask
quest.desc: $npcName:11000170$ spotted the $npcName:11003167$ heading northeast of $map:02000092$. That road leads to $map:02000083$.

quest.name: A Mess of Masks
quest.desc: Your pursuit of the $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$ has led you to the $map:02000083$, where you met $npcName:11000394$. According to her, there is a whole mess of masked figures making a ruckus in the $map:02000121$...

quest.name: Joddy in Distress
quest.desc:
While you were investigating the masked thugs attacking the $map:02000121$, their allies nabbed $npcName:11003166$. If you want to save him, you'll have to lock horns with $npcName:11003334$, the kingpin of $map:02000083$.
You should do this even if you don't want to save $npcName:11003166$.

quest.name: Informative Ivan
quest.desc: You saved $npcName:11003247$ from $npcName:11003334$'s sleazy clutches. Now that you've roughed up $npcName:11003334$'s henchmen, he's eager to give you all the information he has on the mysterious figure you're chasing.

quest.name: An Unreasonable Refusal
quest.desc: $npcName:11003194$'s man $npcName:11000396$ doesn't seem keen to talk to you. Maybe $npcName:11000171$ can tell you what's going on.

quest.name: Ralph's Wrongdoings
quest.desc:
It seems like $npcName:11000396$ has been left out in the cold since he crossed $npcName:11000173$. $npcName:11000171$ believes that the poor man will talk to you if you help him—and the best way to help is by doing his old job for $npcName:11000171$.
You don't quite grasp $npcName:11000171$'s raccoon logic, but he's a king, so he probably knows what he's talking about.

quest.name: For Ivan
quest.desc: You are busy completing menial labor for $npcName:11000171$ in the hopes that it will get $npcName:11000396$ to talk.
quest.manual: Collect Scrap Iron in $map:2000084$ |Defeat $npcName:11000173$'s men in $map:2000084$

quest.name: Job Well Done
quest.desc: In exchange for your help, $npcName:11000171$ put in a good word for you with $npcName:11000396$. Maybe he'll be willing to speak with you now.

quest.name: A Dead End
quest.desc: $npcName:11000396$ is finally talking, but it turns out he hasn't seen the $npcName:11003167$. Was $npcName:11003194$ giving you the runaround this whole time? It's time to return to $map:52000119$ and let $npcName:11003194$ know how you feel about being played for a fool.

quest.name: Ralph's Lead
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000173$ tried to double-cross you. It didn't end well for him.
However, now he claims that he knows where $npcName:11003163$ is...

quest.name: The End of Nelph
quest.desc: You found $npcName:11003163$ in $map:52000037$, but you were too late. Somebody else got here first and ended his life.

quest.name: Ralph's Last Go
quest.desc: The $npcName:11003167$ may have slipped through your fingers, but not before dropping a $item:30000023$. This seems like the sort of thing $npcName:11003334$ would know a lot about.

quest.name: Barrota Port
quest.desc:
After a final attempt to defeat you, $npcName:11000173$ has finally given up. He promises to do everything he can to help your investigation—and he's started by identifying the $npcName:11003167$'s notepad as belonging to the Barrota Trading Company.
Head to $map:02000139$ and see what you can find out.
quest.complete: Talk to a member of the Barrota Trading Company in $map:02000139$

quest.name: A Card in the Chaos
quest.desc: In $map:02000139$, you met a trader named $npcName:11000117$. He says that the crest on the notebook belongs to the president of the Barrota Trading Company. Take the elevator from the $map:02000225$ to reach $map:02000226$ and speak with the Barrota chief face-to-face.

quest.name: Ripert
quest.desc: The $map:02000226$ is in a state of disarray and the Barrota chief is missing. The only clue you could find is $item:30000773$. Apparently this $npcName:11003193$ person is an information broker based out of $map:02000139$. Find him at the $map:52000020$.

quest.name: The Cost of Information
quest.desc: You saved $npcName:11001262$ from Blackstar thugs, and he's thanking you by calling you names and generally being unpleasant. It seems this information broker will keep his lips sealed unless you can guarantee his safety from the mob.

quest.name: Dark Wind
quest.desc: Even though you saved his life twice, $npcName:11001262$ won't just give you the answers you want. While he refuses to tell you anything about the $npcName:11003167$, he's happy to refer you to someone who might. Seek out help at the $map:02000153$ in $map:02000100$.
quest.complete: Speak with a Dark Wind agent in the $map:02000153$ in $map:02000100$

quest.name: To Meet the Boss
quest.desc: You're in $map:02000153$ to dig up clues on the $npcName:11003167$, but Dark Wind's boss is out. A particularly helpful agent named $npcName:11000215$ thinks you can find him in $map:52000124$.
quest.complete: Meet the Dark Wind boss at $map:52000124$ in $map:02000147$

quest.name: Behind the Mask
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ already knows about the caravan ambush and why you came to see him. But there are still some things even he does not know, so meet him in the $map:52000073$ to discuss things in detail.

quest.name: The Great Winn Stilton
quest.desc: The captain of Dark Wind was the great hero, Winn Stilton. However, you've arrived in Kerning City to find a man named $npcName:11000044$ in charge. Find out what became of the previous captain.
quest.manual: Learn about the leader of Dark Wind

quest.name: A Welcome Friend
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000044$ is convinced that $npcName:11000064$ is the $npcName:11003167$ you've been after this whole time. He promises to put Dark Wind's considerable resources behind your investigation.
But wait—who's that cowering against the wall?

quest.name: Missing Person's Person
quest.desc: Your trusty ally $npcName:11003202$ has come to the $map:52000055$ to deliver bad news. When he went to $map:52000037$ to look for more clues, $npcName:11003163$'s body was no longer there. Return to $map:52000037$ with $npcName:11003202$ and check it out.

quest.name: Cherry Blossom Forest
quest.desc:
While investigating $map:52000037$, a frantic sprite appeared and begged for your help. This sprite, $npcName:11003204$, claims that monsters are threatening his people's kingdom. Investigating the caravan attack is important, but helping fairfolk is important, too.
Head to $map:02000290$ and see what you can do.

quest.name: A Semi-clue
quest.desc: After saving the $map:02000290$ from destruction, $npcName:11003204$ mentioned an encounter with a powerful blond human. Could it be $npcName:11003216$? If $npcName:11003204$ is right, then he's headed back to $map:52000073$ to finish what he started!

quest.name: Homebody
quest.desc: You have pressing information for your investigation, but $npcName:11000044$ isn't at the $map:2000153$. Maybe he went back to $map:52000124$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:52000124$ in $map:02000147$ and talk to $npcName:11000044$

quest.name: Katvan's Wrath
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000044$ isn't at $map:52000124$ this time. $npcName:11000069$ took the opportunity to warn you against trusting $npcName:11000044$ too quickly, but a couple of suspicious men interrupted the conversation.
That's pretty rude. You should rough them up. (Also, they're trying to kill $npcName:11000069$.)

quest.name: Hard Heart
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ is in a rage after $npcPlural:11003304$ tried to ambush $npcName:11000069$. Once he calms his nerves, meet him at $map:02000153$.

quest.name: A Tempting Lead
quest.desc: $npcName:11000215$ interrupted your conversation with $npcName:11000044$. It seems someone in $map:02000167$ reported spotting a person matching $npcName:11000064$'s description. Go question $npcName:11001116$, the witness.

quest.name: Masked Motives
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001116$ was keeping an eye on the pollution spreading through $map:02000167$'s garden when she spotted a masked man go inside. Thinking it was the infamous $npcName:11001111$, she reported him to Dark Wind.
You may still be able to catch him if you enter the $map:02000328$ right away.

quest.name: A Trip in Vain
quest.desc: The $map:02000328$ was a bust, but $npcName:11001116$ heard a rumor that might interest you. It seems $npcName:11000543$ over in $map:02000148$ saw someone awfully suspicious.

quest.name: A Report from the Wastes
quest.desc: $npcName:11000543$ says that he actually heard the rumor about $npcName:11001108$ from $npcName:11000533$. Head to the center of $map:02000148$ and pay this $npcName:11000533$ a visit.

quest.name: Exchange of Labor
quest.desc: $npcName:11000533$ says he saw someone matching $npcName:11001111$'s description, but he won't say anything else—not without getting something in return, at least. You'd better do what he says.
quest.manual: Defeat monsters in $map:02000148$ |Clean rusty pipes in $map:02000148$

quest.name: In Your Grasp
quest.desc: $npcName:11000533$ says he spotted $npcName:11001111$ head towards $map:02000139$. If you hurry, you may be able to catch him.

quest.name: After That Blond
quest.desc:
You ran through the streets of $map:02000139$ in pursuit of $npcName:11001111$. Luckily, your dear old treacherous friend $npcName:11000173$ was there to point you in the right direction.
$npcName:11003207$ in $map:02000138$ says he spotted a blond guy head into the $map:52000125$.

quest.name: A Lie of Omission
quest.desc: The blond guy in the warehouse was actually $npcName:11003206$, $npcName:11000211$'s little brother. It seems you were tricked into saving $npcName:11003206$ from a gang of muggers.

quest.name: A Reliable Witness
quest.desc: $npcName:11003206$ claims that he really did see a blond man matching Lennon's description. Since you saved $npcName:11003206$'s brother, it's his turn to help you. Seek out $npcName:11000867$ in $map:02000138$.

quest.name: Memory Trade
quest.desc: $npcName:11000867$ insists that nothing happens in $map:02000138$ without him knowing it, and yet he can't recall where the blond man went. You may have to do something to jog his memory.

quest.name: Merchant's Sighting
quest.desc: $npcName:11000867$ conveniently remembered where the blond man went after you helped him. Head to $map:52000126$.

quest.name: Lennon Lost
quest.desc: The blond man in $map:52000126$ wasn't $npcName:11001111$, but an $npcName:11000213$. The man doesn't seem to have his wits about him. Just as you are about to give up on him, some thugs in familiar masks ambush you...

quest.name: The Awaited Meeting
quest.desc: $npcName:11000211$ and $npcName:11003206$ tracked down the blond man in order to thank you. Your search takes you to the $map:52000046$.

quest.name: Glimpse of the Truth
quest.desc: $npcName:11003215$ claims that he didn't kill $npcName:11003219$. Whatever the case, you need to bring $npcName:11003215$ in for questioning.

quest.name: Hidden Truth
quest.desc:
You've woken up in Kerning City's finest hospital. This is not your day.
Head back to the command office at $map:02000153$ and bring the others up to date.

quest.name: Regroup
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ is very understanding of your failure to capture $npcName:11003215$. Now it's time to regroup and come up with a new plan. Head down to the $map:52000055$ ground floor.

quest.name: Black Mushroom
quest.desc: The radars are picking up something strange. Monsters are invading $map:02000100$! $npc:11000044$ is initiating the Black Mushroom... whatever that is.

quest.name: End of the Investigation
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ thanks you for saving $map:02000100$, but he won't be able to offer you any more help until the city is back on its feet. It's time to return to $map:02000001$ and let them know everything that's happened.

quest.name: Shock after Shock
quest.desc:
The empress is shocked by the death of $npcName:11003219$, who was one of the Seven Heroes.
Your conversation was interrupted by a guard reporting in to $npc:11001666$. What is this about?

quest.name: 더 깊은 곳으로
quest.desc:
마침내 $map:02020036$ 너머를 탐사할 수 있게 되었다고 말하는 $npcName:11004577$.
$map:02020036$ 너머에는 무엇이 있을까?
어서 $map:02020036$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동해서 확인해보자.

quest.name: 최적의 탐사대원
quest.desc:
모두에게 최적의 탐사대원으로 지목받아 난감했지만, 기대에 부응하기 위해 $map:02020036$ 너머로 이동하기로 결심한다.
$npcName:11004582$$pp:는,은$ 1차 탐사 때 발견한 $map:02020066$의 조사를 부탁하는데….
$map:02020066$$pp:를,을$ 조사하기 위해 이동하고, 방해하는 케르베스 세력을 해치우자.

quest.name: 새로운 장소, 새로운 만남
quest.desc:
$map:02020036$$pp:를,을$ 넘어왔다는 말에 놀라는 $npcName:11004571$. 그는 케르베스를 해치우며 왔다는 말에 또 놀란다.
이곳에 대해 질문하자 리더인 $npcName:11004574$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가라고 말하는 $npcName:11004571$. 대신 $npcName:11004574$에게 게오르크에 대한 이야기는 꺼내지 말라고 하는데, 그 이유가 무엇일까?
일단 $npcTitle:11004574$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 굳게 닫힌 마음
quest.desc:
난민 리더를 만나 상황을 설명하려고 했으나, $npcName:11004574$$pp:는,은$ 게오르크란 단어를 들은 이후 강하게 적대감을 표출한다.
검은군단이 나타나 자신들의 발이 묶이는 동안 게오르크가 우리를 위해 무엇을 했냐고 묻는 $npcName:11004574$. 게오르크도 두 전선을 상대하느라 어려움이 있었다고 항변하지만 $npcName:11004574$$pp:는,은$ 듣지 않는다.
이대로 안 되겠다. $npcName:11004574$의 마음을 돌리기 위해 난민들을 도와야겠다.

quest.name: 리더의 추천장
quest.desc:
드디어 마음을 연 $npcName:11004574$.
이곳에 대해 자세히 알고 싶다고 말하니 자기보다 적임자가 있다며, 이 근방의 소문을 다 파악하고 있는 $npcTitle:11004576$$pp:가,이$ 존재한다는 것을 알려준다. 심지어 여태까지의 일이 미안했는지 추천장까지 써 주었다.
추천장을 가지고 어서 $npcTitle:11004576$에게 가보자.

quest.name: 대가를 치르는 방법
quest.desc:
과연 $npcTitle:11004576$$pp:는,은$ 모르는 것이 없었다!
잠깐의 대화로 $npcName:11004430$$pp:를,을$ 찾고 있다는 것을 알아낸 $npcTitle:11004576$$pp:는,은$ 대가를 요구한다.
애처롭게 바라보니 정보료 대신 물건을 받겠다고 말하는 $npc:11004576$.
그가 원하는 $item:30001349$$pp:를,을$ 가져오자.

quest.name: 정보 상인의 직감
quest.desc:
최근 $map:02020067$에 많은 자재가 운반되고 있다고 말하는 $npc:11004576$.
그는 자신의 촉이 말하고 있다며, $map:02020067$에서 무언인가가 만들어지고 있는 것 같다고 말한다.
그의 직감을 믿고 $map:02020067$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동하여 수상한 것이 있는지 확인하자.

quest.name: 새로운 장소, 반가운 만남
quest.desc:
해당 시설이 매우 수상해 보이나, 아직 실체를 파악하지 못해 대응이 어렵다.
정보가 더 있었으면 좋을 텐데….
일단 $npcTitle:11004576$에게 돌아가 다른 정보는 없는지 물어보자.

quest.name: 정보의 중요성
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004576$$pp:는,은$ 해당 시설이 타이렌 왕국의 최신병기 아르케온과 관련된 시설이라고 말했다. 아르케온은 그 위력이 대단해서, $npcName:11004430$에게 넘어가면 위험하다고 말하는 $npcName:11004576$.
당장 달려가려고 하자 맨몸으로 상대하는 것은 무리라며 묘안을 제시한다.
$map:02020035$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동하여 설계도를 확보하면 아르케온의 조종법을 알 수 있을 것이라고 말하는 $npcName:11004576$.
지금 당장 설계도를 확보하러 가자.

quest.name: 해킹을 심부름으로 배웠습니다
quest.desc:
설계도를 확보하기 위해선 공장 내부로 들어가야 하지만 내부로 들어가는 입구가 숨겨져 있는 것 같다.
$npcName:11004580$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11004579$$pp:가,이$ 이럴 땐 해킹이라고 했는데…시도해볼까?

quest.name: 보안 시스템 가동
quest.desc:
공장 내부의 안내 로봇이 아르케온의 설계도는 가장 안쪽에서 찾을 수 있다고 알려 주었다.
단, 안쪽으로 이동하려면 보안 시설의 작동을 종료시켜야 한다고 말하는데….
일단 마땅한 방법이 없으니 안으로 이동해보자.

quest.name: 격돌! 아르케온
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004584$$pp:를,을$ 만나 설계도를 건네주었지만, 그는 필요 없다고 고집을 부렸다.
아르케온을 무찌르러 이동하기 전, 함께할 것을 제안했지만 단호하게 거절하는 $npcName:11004584$, 아직 이곳을 모르지 않냐고 다시 설득하자, 이내 마음을 돌려 함께하기로 약속했다.
이제 남은 것은 아르케온을 쓰러트리는 일뿐이다.

quest.name: 미확인 에너지원
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004430$$pp:가,이$ $map:02020070$ 넘어 $map:02020071$에서 검은군단을 지휘한다는 사실을 알아냈다고 하는 $npc:11004577$. 하지만 $map:02020071$$pp2:로,으로$ 향하는 관문에 식별되지 않은 에너지원이 발견되어 돌입이 주저된다고 했다.
모두를 위해 직접 눈으로 해당 에너지원이 무엇인지 파악해야 할 것 같다.
$npcName:11004584$$pp:는,은$ 함께 가자고 하였으나, 아직 크리티아스에 대해 잘 모를 것 같아 $npcName:11004582$에게 안내를 부탁했다.
$npcName:11004582$$pp:가,이$ 엄청 고마워하던데, 그 이유는 뭘까? 궁금하지만 일단 에너지원부터 확인하고 방해하는 몬스터를 혼내줘야 한다.

quest.name: 과거의 유물
quest.desc:
방해하는 몬스터들을 해치우고 있었는데 갑자기 큰 진동이 느껴졌다.
이 흔들림은 도대체 뭘까?

quest.name: 공부의 부작용
quest.desc:
$map:02020070$에서 찍은 사진을 본 $npcName:11004582$$pp:는,은$, 미확인 에너지원이 과거 타이렌 왕국을 지키는 병기 $npcName:11004684$$pp:라고,이라고$ 말했다.
